title: Quiz for Dragon Ball Z
description:
Are you an avid fan of Dragon Ball Z? Do you think you know everything about Goku, Vegeta and Piccolo? Are you familiar with all series trivia?

Test your knowledge with our application, Quiz for Dragon Ball Z! Answer questions and get the most points!

Quiz features:
•   Over 340 questions,
•   3 game modes (Classic, Sudden Death, Time Challenge),
•   Online scores and achievements - compete with your friends and see which one of you knows Dragon Ball Z the best!
•   The opportunity to propose your own question, which, after moderation, may be included in our quiz. Thank you for all the proposals!
•   The quiz doesn't require an Internet connection to play,
•   Tablet-optimized UI,
•   And much, much more!

Discover interesting facts and trivia, which you may not have known yet! Do not wait, play Quiz for Dragon Ball Z today!

All intellectual rights belong to their respective owners. The application is unofficial and created for educational purposes.

title: True or False (Biblical)
description:
True or false (Biblical) is the new game for you to learn and study the Bible having fun.
Find out if the statement is true or false and test your Biblical knowledge.
Are 2000 questions for you to answer.

With 3 levels of difficulty the game becomes increasingly difficult and fun.
Easy: you have 60 seconds to answer, each error loses 1 life and each hit gets 1 life.
Medium: you have 40 seconds to respond, every mistake loses 1 life and each hit wins half life.
Hard: you have 20 seconds to respond, every mistake loses half life, and gets nothing every hit.

We hope you enjoy this new game of Bible:)

title: Shakers Game Quiz 2018
description:
Shakers Game Quiz is a game created for fans of the Nick series who want to demonstrate everything they know about Game Shakers.

The game consists of 40 levels with modified images of the Game Shakers characters. You must guess the names, if you get the right coins, if you do not know the name of a character you can share the image with your friends or use the coins for hints.

Only the best fans of the series manage to surpass all the levels.


CHARACTERISTICS:

- 40 levels
- The names of the characters are in English


DISCLAIMER

This is UNOFFICIAL game of Game Shakers inspired by the TV series, created by fans for fans of the series.

title: Gana Lana
description:
***INSTRUCCIONES DE GANA LANA***

HORARIOS DE JUEGOS
 - Cada vez que abras la aplicación, podrás ver la hora y el premio del siguiente juego.  Suelen a ser a las 3PM y 9PM pero a veces tenemos juegos espontáneos.

COMO JUGAR
 - Cinco minutos antes de que comienze el juego, empezará una cuenta regresiva.  Es importante abrir la aplicación durante esta etapa para poder conectarte al sistema de juego antes de que se muestre la primer pregunta.

 - Cada juego tiene una cierta cantidad de preguntas, y hay 10 segundos para contestar cada pregunta.

 - Para ganar, hay que llegar jugando hasta el final y contestar la última pregunta correctamente.

COMO COBRAR
 - Al final de cada juego, el premio se reparte entre todos los ganadores que llegaron hasta el final y contestaron la última pregunta correctamente.  Saldrá una pantalla con los ganadores y sus ganancias.

 - Cada quien puede ver lo que ha ganado y lo que tiene por cobrar.  Para intercambiar entre las ganancias totales y lo que hay por cobrar simplemente presione donde salen esta información.

 - Puedes retirar tus ganancias al llevar más de $50 MXN ganados.  Puedes cobrar por la aplicación misma.

USAR Y RECUPERAR TUS VIDAS
 - Si contestas una pregunta mal, puedes usar una vida extra para seguir jugando.  Puedes usar hasta tres vidas por juego.

 - Si llegas a perder, es importante quedarte observando el juego hasta el final, ya que en la pantalla de ganadores saldrá una opción para poder recuperar hasta tres vidas que podrás usar en los próximos juegos.

 - Adicionalmente, puedes conseguir mas vidas presionando al boton de "Vidas" en el app.
 
¡Mucha suerte!

- Puedes retirar tus ganancias al llevar más de $50 MXN ganados. Puedes cobrar por la aplicación misma.

USAR Y RECUPERAR TUS VIDAS
- Si contestas una pregunta mal, puedes usar una vida extra para seguir jugando. Puedes usar hasta tres vidas por juego.

- Si llegas a perder, es importante quedarte observando el juego hasta el final, ya que en la pantalla de ganadores saldrá una opción para poder recuperar hasta tres vidas que podrás usar en los próximos juegos.

- Adicionalmente, puedes conseguir mas vidas presionando al boton de "Vidas" en el app.

¡Mucha suerte!
summary: Win Lana is a trivia game where you can win money if you answer well.
recentChanges: Consigue tus vidas extras en cualquier lugar, a cualquier hora!

title: School Bubbles
description:
Do you miss your school days? Ready to go back in time, and enjoy all the classic school games? Then, this is for you! School Bubbles is the classic bubble shooter game. Join the adventure today and experience hours of endless fun with our addictive and relaxing bubble game. This is a cool bubble shooter numbers game - pop the number bubbles until you reach the target.

Fans of high school arcade games? Play this bubble shooter game now and beware - it's addicting! School Bubbles is a fun popping game with awesome boosters and amazing levels. Discover plenty of thrilling school days levels, cool graphics and effects and retro gaming experience. Unlock awesome power-ups and boosters to solve levels and win points. 

It’s a fun puzzle bubble game shooting adventure you definitely don’t want to miss! Get back to school, pop balloons and enjoy a simple fun game with family and friends!

- Match 3 or more balls of the same color to pop the group and win points. 
- Plan your every pop and blast the numbered trivia bubbles to reach the level’s target.
- Plan your shots and pop your way through thousands of levels. 
- Free bubble swap- just tap on your bubble to change its color.
- Solve levels, create major bubble drops, and earn awesome boosters!
- Play this easy game with no wifi and no internet required.
Unlock these power-ups by making special shots: 
- Pop 7  bubbles in a row to earn a fireball that will burn every bubble on the way. 
- Drop 10 balloons in a single shot to get a bomb that will take out surrounding balls. 

Love popping bubbles and solving arcade puzzles? 
Play School Bubbles puzzle game for free and enjoy thousands of exciting levels of joy and fun. Don’t wait any longer to join the most fun bubble smashing puzzle game, try it out today and experience hours of endless excitement! 

All rights of Bubble Shooter™ are owned by Ilyon Dynamics Ltd.

title: 94 Seconds - Categories Game
description:
1 category, 1 letter, 1 word to find and score higher than your friends.

A fruit with B? 
A sport with T? 
A mammal with D? 

Want to play? Then download fast 94 Seconds categories game right now! More than 50 different categories: countries, fruits, musical instruments, tools, cosmetics... 

*** INSTRUCTIONS *** 

* 1 category and 1 letter: find as many right answers as possible! A real brain challenging free app 

* 3 different jokers are available to help you to find a right answer or to set higher scores. 

* Typos and spelling errors are allowed, within reasons... If you have a wrong answer or skip (3s less), you can take a look at the examples at the end of a game. (""""I knew it"""") 

* Rare or hard response: 1 point if answer is easy, 2 if it is rare or difficult. Example: A fruit beginning with P? Peach 1 point, 2 points for Persimmon! 

* Series: Right answers in a row give additional points and will boost your score! 

* Too easy ? Change the language and use the app to learn foreign words

***6 LANGUAGES AVAILABLE - GAME THAT WORKS WITH OUT WIFI / NO INTERNET CONNECTION*** 

You can play in English, French, German, Italian, Portuguese and Spanish.
Game will work without internet connection. App loads fast: perfect game when bored or offline

title: Superbook Bible Trivia Game
description:
The FREE SUPERBOOK Bible Trivia Game is a great way for the entire family to have a blast while learning about the Bible. This exciting app is brought to you from the producers of the Emmy-nominated SUPERBOOK animation series. 

Gizmo, SUPERBOOK'S loveable robot, will be your host as you encounter a wide array of highly engaging questions and answers about the Bible. 

FEATURES OF THE SUPERBOOK BIBLE TRIVIA APP INCLUDE:

• THREE POWER-UPS – If a Bible trivia question has you stumped, you can call on the ever-comical Gizmo to help you answer it – this is when the real fun begins. The lifelines that Gizmo offers are:

> THE LIGHTNING BOLT – Be careful choosing ‘The Lightning Bolt’ option as a big surprise awaits Gizmo after he walks on screen. The aftermath of this activity will be that one incorrect answer will be taken away – super-helpful on True/False Bible trivia questions :)

> THE SNOWFLAKE – Want the timer to ‘cool off’? Then you’ll want to choose ‘The Snowflake’ option, so that Gizmo can use his freeze ray to stop time. This will give you unlimited time to choose the correct trivia answer.

> GIZMO GUESS – When all else fails, you can choose the ‘Gizmo Guess’ option. When summoned, Gizmo will slide on screen, check his internal database, and then choose the correct trivia answer for you. 

> UNLOCKING POWER-UPS – Each correct trivia answer brings players a step closer to unlocking valuable power-ups.

> DOWNLOADING POWER-UPS – Once a lifeline has been unlocked, players must download the power-up in order to use it.

> EARNING BACK POWER-UPS – Each correct answer earns players a gem. These gems can be used to purchase unlimited power-ups.

• UNLIMITED BIBLE HINTS – Shhhh! If you are playing against somebody and trying to beat their high score, you may want to keep this option a secret. If you choose the green Superbook Device button, you will get the Bible verse and it will almost always show you the correct Bible trivia answer.

You get one Bible hint for every trivia question that is asked. Also, the timer will stop for a period of time, so that you can read the Bible verse.

• THREE LEVELS TO PLAY – There are 3 levels to keep all players happy.

> EASY – This level is great for people who are just starting to get their reading and Bible trivia skills up to speed. You are given 30 seconds to read the trivia question and choose the correct answer. The time allowed to answer the question can be doubled, if you choose to read the Bible verse associated with the question. The EASY level gives 10 points for each correct answer.

> MEDIUM – This level is for people who want a little more of a Bible trivia challenge. There is less time to answer questions (20 seconds), but you receive more points (20) for each correct answer. And remember, the Bible help will double your time.

> HARD – Think you have top-notch Bible trivia skills? Do you want a challenge that will impress your family and friends? Then you’ll want to play on the HARD level, where time is short (only 5 seconds), but the winnings are big – 30 points for each correct answer.

Loaded with interactive content, the SUPERBOOK Bible Trivia Game will bring God’s Word to life in a lively and entertaining way. Download the app and let the Bible trivia fun begin!

★ Guess the name of the team name or city by combining different letters

title: What dinosaur are you? Test
description:
Get a charge of joy and fun from passing the test "What dinosaur are you?".
Maybe a million years ago you were a dinosaur? Find out which the dinosaur you could be!

Maybe you're Tyrannosaurus! Or Pterodactyl? This test will help to find out!

The test presents a lot of dinosaurs, and one of them will definitely suit you! This is not a simulator! The test compares your answers with the habits and behavior of different dinosaurs, and determines with whom of the dinazaurs you have more coincidences.

This application is more like a joke, which you can share with your friends and have a great time with them!

Or you can send this test to your friend or give him a to pass the test on your smartphone to find out which dinosaur is he.

title: Trivia Questions and Answers Kids
description:
Trivia Questions and Answers Kids is a game of questions classified in 6 subjects: Geography, Entertainment, History, Art and Literature, Science and Nature, Sport and leisure. Each question has four answers and only one of them is correct.

This trivial junior is a game with easy questions for the whole family, from children to elders.

The operation of this Trivia Kids is very simple:
1- Select a category or all 6 categories.
2- Answer 10 questions of Trivial Kids. The more accurate and faster answer questions more points you have!


You can see your progress and compare your results with your friends with rankings and achievements. To access them you must be registered to Google+ and have Internet access.

In rankings you will see your punctuations and all players points. What is your best position?

When you play you can also unlock achievements. There are many different achievements. The more you play, the more chances you have to unlock achievements!

title: Knowledge Trainer: Trivia
description:
Knowledge Trainer: Trivia is the quiz app for smart people. It’s designed to stimulate your brain with over 5,000 high-quality, challenging, and informative questions.

Gain access to an experience on your Android device that has already hooked 4 million players around the world: an exciting, informative, and inspiring trivia game app that is hard to put down. Warm up your brain for free with 20 lessons and 200 high-quality, challenging questions and see why Knowledge Trainer is for you!
 
Each lesson tests your wits with 10 questions from 10 different categories. The difficulty level depends on your progress. Get an answer right and you'll move up a level. A wrong answer leads to an easier question. You'll want to move up to improve your Knowledge Quotient, which is recalculated after every round.
 
More app features:
• 5 difficulty levels, 10 general knowledge training categories
• 20 lessons and 200 questions, thousands more for premium users
• One additional free quiz round each day
• Quiz questions in 3 languages including French and German
• Review function for missed questions
• Save game progress for 1-3 players
 
Choose between American, British, and Australian gameplay modes (with country-specific questions and regional rankings) or enjoy the app in International mode. 
 
Improve your general knowledge with regular training. You can review category-specific statistics as you go to see how you have progressed after each quiz round. 
 
Enjoy 20 lessons in one of the best quiz games in the Play Store for free. When you have completed your free training in the app, do a review to boost your general knowledge level or upgrade to premium to bring your expertise to new heights.
 
Our promise: the smartest, most interesting trivia app in the Play Store. But don't take our word for it: check out our user reviews!

title: Guia HQ Trivia Gameshow
description:
HQ Trivia - High Quality Tips And Guide ,The app takes a form of a live game show, which airs at 9 PM Eastern Time daily, with an extra show at 3 PM Eastern on weekdays.
The host asks a series of (usually) twelve increasingly difficult multiple choice questions, each with three possible answers. So far, the highest number of questions asked has been 15 (normally on Sundays). Players who get a question correct within the 10-second limit move on; the rest are eliminated. Any question that eliminates a greater number of players than get the question correct is deemed a "savage question" (though some hosts do not do this).

DISCLAIMER:
This is a simple application that contain guides and strategies for This game . You can see strategies, tips, tricks and much more.
This is an UNOFFICIAL Guide & Tips, this application is made by fans!
#Please note - This is not a game !! It's is game tips.
All the game name, images, characters, logo and other details are not created by us but by their respective owners

The challenge? Shout out the ten answers listed for each topic before the clock runs out – the more brains in the game, the better!

descriptionHTML:
Shoutrageous is the fast-paced trivia game played on "The Real" in which you need to know a thing or two about everything from celebrities to sports, to relationships... to what’s in the fridge! The challenge? Shout out the ten answers listed for each topic before the clock runs out – the more brains in the game, the better!

Play Shoutrageous at parties, family get-togethers, or just hanging out with friends!
Features:
-Three bonus categories included with app purchase
-Play with one friend or with a large group
-Fun and hilarious categories
-Lucky answers worth double the points
-Listen to the audio of a round to settle disputes or just for amusement
-Bonus reverse mode round mixes things up
-Enjoy the many outrageously entertaining topics!
Visit Shoutrageous.com for more information.
Questions? Concerns? Email us at support@shoutrageous.com.
Follow Shoutrageous for exclusive contests and content:
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/shoutrageousapp
Twitter: @shoutrageousapp
Instagram: https://instagram.com/shoutrageousapp

title: What's the Restaurant? Guess Restaurants Quiz Game
description:
Can you guess all the restaurants? Challenge yourself and your friends in this fun, free restaurant and food quiz! 

There are over 200 restaurant logos in this quiz, and we’re guessing you won’t be able to guess ALL the restaurants. If you’re stumped, your friends and family are welcome to try too!

Ready to see if you can guess all 200 restaurants?

• FREE AND ADDICTING WORD TRIVIA GAME •

-▸ From everyday fast food restaurants, to more obscure restaurants, this word trivia game has them all. 

• INSTANT FUN •

-▸ Download and get started guessing right away. It’s an easy to play word game. Plus, it’s free! 

• GAME WITH FRIENDS •

-▸ Know a foodie? Ask friends who really know their food or restaurants for help on Facebook, Twitter or Instagram. It’s simple and easy to game with friends! 

• PERFECT FOR FAMILY AND FRIENDS •

-▸ This is a fun, family-friendly quiz game that’s perfect for the whole family. Kids and adults will love this restaurant and food word game!

• BEST GUESS THE RESTAURANT GAME •

⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐  - “Love a challenge! I downloaded this and another app on the same day last week, and I am still enjoying this one. The other was finished in a day. It’s such a challenge, but I love it!” - Lunachik2981

⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐ - “When I’m bored I just play this game. It gets my brain warmed up. This game is a keeper.” - Tiger2704

⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐- “Finally! A game that I can use to test how much I know my favorite eating places. I’m a fast foodaholic and this game proves it.” - Anniepoo2u

• GET HELP TO GUESS THE RESTAURANT •

Don’t worry, with our coin feature, you’ll never really get stuck on a challenging trivia question. Earn coins along the way that can be used to help you get out of a bind later. 

• CONSTANTLY UPDATED •

We’re constantly updating What’s the Restaurant based on feedback and to add even more trivia features. Don’t worry, more fast food and other fun restaurants are always being added. 

• NOSTALGIC FAVORITES AND NEW ADDITIONS •

Relive your favorite memories eating at these restaurants as you guess. Or, get some new inspiration on where to eat next! Find your next favorite restaurant while testing your mind in this fun trivia game.

• FREE TO PLAY WORD GAME •

You’ll have a blast trying to guess some of the trickier restaurant logos. If you do guess all the restaurants, feel free to call yourself a restaurant connoisseur, because you’ve earned it.

-▸ Download now for free and start playing right away!

title: Game of Thrones (Game)
description:
Game of Thrones
Clash for the Victory and get points and capture the iron throne,
Get Ready for the Clash, Prepare your self for the Latest Season of the Game of Thrones season 8. So stay tuned to us and get the glory. GOTQUIZ, GOT QUIZ.

GAME OF THRONES GAME

GOT Latest 2018:
*Westeros is at war,
*Great houses clash, 
*dragons rule the sky, 
*the army of the dead threatens the realm.  
*Live out your fantasy and Guess the war.  
*Build your profile and raise your level and compete with other lords.
*Based on the award-winning series, Game of Thrones Game allows players to become a Lord of Seven Kingdoms.
*Compete with other lords around the world, Guess and get points and became a no.1 lord of the real world. 
*Winter is here and your enemy’s army will not wait to clash between guess.  
*Wage war and join the battle today to capture the Iron Throne!

A REAL GAMING EXPERIENCE
“In the game of thrones, you win or you die.” - Cersei Lannister

-Become a lord of Westeros: Build your great profile, create your imaginations, and Fight for the Crown.
-Interact with main characters, Houses, Lands and Throne from the hit series, including Jon Snow, Daenerys Targaryen, Petyr Baelish, Cersei Lannister and more.
-Guess 120+ iconic Seats of Power like  Dragonstone, Castle Black, Winterfell, and King’s Landing etc.
-Guess the characters, Noble Houses, Territories of the Biggest Season of the world GOT and get points to become a No# 1 lord from all over the world.

ALL THE SEVEN KINGDOMS WILL REMEMBER YOUR NAME
“It’s the family name that lives on. It’s all that lives on.” - Tywin Lannister

-Guess houses and claim your territory to rise in political influence.
-Guess characters and clash against rival lords to capture iconic Seats of Power.
-Guess the GOT map, clash with your enemies, and spread your influence

DO YOU KNOW ME!
“Fight every battle everywhere, always, in your mind. Everyone is your enemy, everyone is your friend.” - Petyr Baelish

Get points and share them with your friends and tell them that you are the lord.
Share your points, Screenshots, Level, and game with your friends and let them see that how much you are interested in the Game of thrones Iron Throne.
Share it on Almost All social sharing sites Like Facebook, WHATSAPP, INSTAGRAM, Twitter, Tagged, Google +, and so on.

All the pictures and the sounds and totally free for use in the commercial area and we did not use any content that is copyrighted to anyone, and if you have any concern then you can contact us at 4studioappsup@gmail.com.

title: 101 Pics: Photo Quiz
description:
The aim of the game is to guess what's on the picture.  While using the least number of clicks. 
Each click opens up a portion of the photo. The earlier the answer becomes clear, the larger the bonus will be. 
Thanks to this game you'll easily increase your vocabulary, guessing skills and attentiveness. 

The game 101 Pictures is fun, captivating and totally free.
It's a new quiz in the casual puzzle genre. 

HOW TO PLAY
• Words are collected in themed packs. Inside each word pack there is defined theme.
• Use 4 free and 4 paid clicks to open the picture to the necessary point. 
• As soon as it becomes clear what's on the photo, type the answer and get bonus coins. 
• Having finished one pack, move on to another! 

FOR THE ENTIRE FAMILY
It is very interesting to play this game along with friends or family, amaze them with your knowledge, pass the packs together!

CHIPS
• Find out new words, playing themed word sets.
• Find out the exact names of familiar objects.
• Develop your mind and vocabulary
• Play with friends and compete with one another
• Visually pleasing, simple graphics
• Ratings and achievements
• There are many themed collections
• Simple and easy
• Daily bonus
• Free hints at the beginning
• Excellent training for the brain
• For phones and tablets


EASY AND FUN TO PLAY
A simple and intuitive interface with unobtrusive graphics allows you to fully concentrate on game play.

MANY LEVELS
The game has collected many unique levels, compiled on the level of difficulty. 
Themed packs are constantly being added to make the game more diverse! 

Guess the pictures by theme:
• animals
• sports
• flags
• food
• capital cities
• drawings
• kitchen
• plants
• beauty
• clothes
• nature
• and others


IN MANY LANGUAGES
The following languages are fully supported:
• English
• German
• French
• Russian
• Portuguese
• Spanish
• Italian

NO INTERNET NEEDED
No wi-fi, no problem!  The game can function without the Internet, which makes it an excellent timekiller on the road. However, the Internet is necessary to download packs and sync your progress.

NO TIME LIMITS
You can play calmly, and at any time, close or minimize applications and continue from where you left off  without losing the progress level.

We're on social media:
https://www.facebook.com/101pics
https://vk.com/game101pics

Guess the various pictures for your pleasure :)
Good luck in the game!

title: Perk Pop Quiz!
description:
Earn real CASH prizes for playing trivia with Perk Pop Quiz!

The more answers you get correct, the more Points you earn. Points can then be exchanged for cash on your Perk Plastik Discover Card, or real gift cards from Amazon.com, Starbucks, Nike, GameStop, Target, +100's more!

*** PERK POP QUIZ IS COMPLETELY FREE & DOES NOT REQUIRE ANY IN-APP PURCHASES!

Choose from 400+ Categories Including:
• Picture games like Cartoon Characters, Album Covers, Name the Pokémon, and Name the Show.
• Popular shows like Big Bang Theory, Game of Thrones, Walking Dead, & More!
• Movie Quotes & Match the Song Lyrics.
• Word Scramble, Vocabulary, & Spelling.
• Science, Math, Anatomy, & State Capitals.
• Disney, Star Wars, & Harry Potter.
... And many more added every day!

CASH PRIZES DAILY!
Automatically be entered to win daily cash prizes up to $50 just for playing challenges & getting high scores!

CHALLENGE YOUR FRIENDS!
Earn more points when you when you beat your friends playing fun trivia games.

title: What's That Smell
description:
WARNING: DELICATE NOSES BEWARE! Player Discretion Advised.

The What's That Smell app is the official companion app to the party game that stinks! What’s that Smell? is the hilariously fragrant guessing game that opens up a world of interesting whiffs. Guess the scents correctly to win or you may suffer the stinky consequences!

Game box comes with 48 Mystery Whiff Cards, 4 Stank Cards including Hot Chunky Vomit, Diaper Blowout, Smothered in B.O. and Extra Old Toe Cheese, 4 resealable scent-barrier bags, 6 cardholders, Whiff Strips, a scorepad and instructions.
For 2-6 Players ages 14+

Download the What’s That Smell companion app for more fun:

- Concentrate on your sniffing: The app will keep track of what’s happening during the game.

- Earn extra bonus points by comparing your guesses with other people who played the game. Look up additional answers in-app or even submit your own.

- Most importantly: Record the priceless Whiff Of Shame, complete with fun Stank Card filters you can add and a don’t-miss-a-revolting-second slow-mo effect!

title: Bible Trivia Quiz Free
description:
Want to increase your bible knowledge and bible dictionary, but also enjoy a great bible quiz? Try one of the best bible trivia games of the year! Unique, fun and well-thought 750 bible quiz questions are awaiting you packed in 30 levels. You will find quotes, encouraging bible verses, stories, characters and situations. Bible quiz with answers you will have hard time turning off!

TEST YOUR KNOWLEDGE OF THE BIBLE
The Bible should be the most read books in the world. But let’s be real, it's not. Some people live their whole lives without even owning one. If you have read it, or read some bits and want to test your bible knowledge, this is definitely one of the best apps to do so. This is the bible trivia with answers that will significantly enhance your knowledge.

UNIQUE BIBLE QUIZ QUESTIONS AND ANSWERS
Our bible quiz game is fun and unique. Most of the questions are unseen before in any other similar app. They are fun and challenging, especially as you progress throughout the levels. This can be a bible quiz for kids too, but generally it is a trivia app for all ages.

HOW TO PLAY
As we previously said, this bible quiz app is divided into 30 levels. Here are the rules bellow:
	•	Each level must be completed in 80% to unlock the next level. 
	•	Each level has 25 questions. If you get 20 questions correct, next level is unlocked 
	•	For 20 questions answered, you get 1 star, for 21 questions you get 2 stars and for at least 22 questions you get 3 stars. Stars are used to know how well you knew to answer and eventually restart each level to know all the answers.
	•	The time allocated for each question is 30 seconds and the number of lives each round is 5 lives, giving you the chance to review some questions
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Your knowledge and increased connection with God is only one game away.
Respect the Kingdom of God’s influence and sharpen your knowledge of the Bible. 
We pray that this app will motivate you to read the Bible as well, on a regular basis.

ADDITIONAL INFO:
- Play button will load the last level unlocked
- We will update the questions frequently - Tap the desired number to resume any unlocked level - Response In question is made by pressing the correct version in the allocated time - If the time out of the screen is less than 30 seconds, you have to change the settings for your phone or tablet so it does not interrupts the game. -------------------------------------------------------------------------
Because the database is large enough, in case you will find wrong answers, please send an email to: support@acadevelopers.com to rectify them.
Coming soon in more languages.

title: Bible Quiz - Free Offline Trivia App
description:
★ BEST BIBLE QUIZ ★

How much do you know about the Bible? Do you think you know all the facts and verses?

Our Bible Quiz will let you test your knowledge!

Install this awesome educational quiz app, read the questions about the Bible and try to answer them! How good is your Christian and biblical knowledge?

Our Bible Quiz covers every aspect of both of the Christian Bibles - the Old Testament and the New Testament. See how much you already know and learn new facts as well!

No network connection? No worries, you can use this app offline. Just remember to study before taking the quiz!

title: Quiz Panic General Knowledge
description:
Adopt a Quizzy! These little monsters are addicted to General Knowledge! Send yours flying up to the top of the food chain as you go head-to-head against other Quizzies in some incredible live action battles!

Play 20-player LIVE rounds in this never-before-seen mobile game! Discover just how fun General Knowledge Quizzes can really be:    
- Copy the other players… without ever getting caught out!
- Change your mind any time you like… and we won’t judge!
- If you get the wrong answers… you can still win! 
- Carry on quizzing… even when you’ve been knocked out!
- Panic… but in peace!
=> Will you simply mimic everyone else? Will you change your mind? How about a spot of bluffing?
  3 game modes 
-> Panic Mode: 4 to 6 players fight it out in a 5-question quiz! The winners make it through to the next round… Chaos Mode!
->  Chaos Mode: 20 players, 10 questions, eliminations, select questions…  a whirlwind of madness! 
->  Friend Mode: tackle 1 to 10 friend(s) head-on in a LIVE assault!
 And there’s more! 
- Anyone can play - age 7 to 117 years! 
- A whole heap of free games available every day!
- The questions and players you’ll be up against are matched to your level and skills!
- More than 20,000 questions!
- Close to 100 question categories
- New cute and cuddly buddies: Quizzies! 
- 100 missions to accomplish
-  Make your way through 10 stages of evolution
- 30 rewards to unlock

From the developers of Superbuzzer and some of the most successful online versions of well-known French quizzes and hit game showd … with a total of more than 10 million players!!!

description:
Can you guess the word and unlock all the levels?

Each puzzle contains four pictures that have one word in common. Play hundreds of puzzles that become more challenging as you progress. The more puzzles you can solve, the more levels you will unlock.

- Game progress is synced with Facebook. So you can play from either your phone or PC.

title: The Hardest Quiz 2
description:
If you like the 1st part, you'll find this one the hardest of all tests!

The rules are simple, try to answer all of "questions". Sounds easy enough, however, you will have to use your reflexes, crazy skills, and a nice bit taste of logic in order to be able to accomplish that.
Some questions are multiple choice, but there are many others that will have out-of-logic surprises! You will have to try to think outside the box. Will you be able to solve all the tricky questions?

title: Horror Movies Trivia Quiz
descriptionHTML:
If you like horror films, “Horror Movies Trivia Quiz” is simply made for you! This entertaining and helpful trivia game consists of tons of quiz questions on the scariest films ever made and now you have them all at your disposal 24/7! “Guess the movie”, guess the actor, answer to “movie quotes trivia” questions and check out your film knowledge with this free quiz game! This great picture quiz has it all! Famous producers, actors, actresses and a lot more! Recognize your own favorite actor or actress in the picture and learn about horror films you haven't seen! Don't waste the opportunity to download the ultimate horror movies trivia quiz and enjoy guessing your favorite horror movies and actors and answering interesting movie trivia quiz questions! Your knowledge of horror heroes, plots, weapons, murders, and more is now at stake! Don't hesitate! Download this awesome trivia game and invite your friends! Beat their high scores and become a champion of the scariest films!

✔ 5 levels of difficulty!
✔ More than 300 multiple choice questions!
✔ You have 20 seconds to choose the right quiz answer - do it fast;
✔ Use one of 3 available lifelines to solve the questions:
✰ 50:50 – remove two incorrect answers;
✰ Switch your question with another one;
✰ Use the help of your friends – take a look at their answers shown in percentages.
✔ Three errors in a row - game over;
☑ Remember - use lifelines less and win more coins! Cash in your knowledge and feel like a millionaire!

Do you love to be creeped out by a horror film that can send shivers down your spine? If yoor answer is YES, we have a list of horror movies trivia questions you can work your way through! Wake up your primal fears! A collection of all the scariest movies is awaiting you in “Horror Movies Trivia Quiz”! This fun game has simple rules – there are 4 offered answers to the trivia quiz questions and your task is to choose the correct one! Guess the actor or the actress, guess the movie and answer easy horror films game questions as you progress to more difficult ones! If you think you know names of scary films and you like playing movie trivia games, this horror films quiz game is the right app for you! Guess the film quizzes are very intriguing as they make you think of every single movie you have watched, and this app is exactly one such brain teaser! Guess the actor, guess the celebrity, test your horror films knowledge with this fun “quiz on movies”! What is you favorite horror movie of all times? Can you find it in this film quiz? Who is your favorite horror actor or actress? Can you recognize him or her in the picture? Download this fun trivia game and exercise your brain by playing this addictive quiz game to see how much you know about horror films!

Horror films have been captivating audiences around the world for more than a century now. If you are a true fan of this popular movie genre, you will easily fall in love with our scary movies trivia game! Download “Horror Movies Trivia Quiz” for Android TM for free and spend your spare time with this awesome mobile app for tablets and smartphones! Try your luck, put your movie knowledge to the test and get to the top of the leader board! Become a real horror films quiz master!
summary: Helpful and fun movie trivia about the genre testing people's fears

title: The Office Fan Quiz
description:
The Office aired for nine seasons in the US, becoming one of America’s most popular sitcoms. Who would have thought that the story of a small paper company and their employees from Scranton would provide us with so many memorable moments? Test your knowledge on this show with this fan quiz! Can you answer questions from all seasons? Can you finish satisfied and smiling? That's what she said.

Enjoy the game with: 
-Four  levels based on each season plus the ultimate level with questions from all seasons. 
-Database of more than 300 questions.
-Play against the time, the faster you get an answer right, the more points you get!
-Unlock each level by getting a score better than 70%.
-Compare your best scores for each level.
-The Office background music 

Play and learn more about characters, and interesting facts. This fast-paced game will make you an expert on each season! An easy and simple game for all ages, fun guaranteed for all The Office fans.

We value your feedback and would like to hear from you. Please feel free to share your comments here, or email us at pocketalphaapps@gmail.com

title: 94 Degrees: fun trivia quiz
description:
“You’re cold, you’re getting warmer, you’re burning….” Does this bring back memories? Play this addicting game and test your general knowledge while having fun! 

After 94 Seconds, with over 15 million downloads, discover the new 94 game developed by Scimob. 

Find an image or a zone and pin it! The closer you are, the hotter you get. You’ve already caught on, the right answer is at 94°. 

Where is Brazil? 
What is the top speed of a leopard? 
Where are your triceps? 
Where is the ham on a pig?
What does a golden retriever look like? and a monkfish?
Where is the red color on a rainbow?
You like sirloin, but can you find it on a beef picture?

Complete all the levels with diverse questions on countries, logos, fingers of the hand, historic dates, culinary specialties, the parts of a pig, geometrical shapes, states, speeds of different animals, country flags,  hidden symbols and objects, musical instruments, fruits, dogs, fish etc… 

---------------------------- 

*** INSTRUCTIONS *** 

* 1 image, 1 zone to find: it’s up to you to pin it! The closer you get to the right answer, the hotter it gets, and the more the lizard appreciates the heat! Of course, you’ll find the right answer at 94°! 

* 2 different jokers are available to help you find the answer. 

*** NEW 2 PLAYER MODE ***

Challenge your friends!

*** AVAILABLE IN 6 LANGUAGES *** 

You can play in English, French, Spanish, German, Russian or Portuguese.

title: Disney Quiz - English Version
description:
Play to guess the characters of the Disney Classics!

At each level you will be shown a character from one of the many Disney Classics and you will have to guess the name in order to access the next level.

The first levels are easy, there are the great protagonists of the films, but then going forward you will meet all the characters of the films and you will have to show that you are a real enthusiast to access the next levels.

Share the game with your friends and ask for help when you do not know a character and together you can go through the history of Disney Classics.



Tutti i personaggi, seppur rielaborati e modificati, e i nomi riportati sono di proprietà della Disney e vengono usati in questa applicazione al solo scopo di condivisione di una passione dei grandi classici Disney e di stimolo alla visione dei film stessi.

title: Quizoid: Free Trivia w General Knowledge Questions
description:
Quiz Features overview:
★ 7,000+ trivia questions from easy to hard, from funny to interesting
★ 17 fields of knowledge with facts about sports, entertainment, science and more
★ 3 game modes: play endless on Classic mode, get 20 questions without game over on 20-Questions mode or play against the clock on Arcade mode
★ 3 lifelines: 50/50, 2-shots and change question
★ offline playable: on long road trips or while on the subway
★ always up-to-date: regular updates with fresh questions (as of August 2017)

Boring afternoon? Then why not test your knowledge, learn new facts and boost your education? Quizoid is a demanding multiple choice trivia with 3 different game modes. Play a quiz as long as you like with sudden death on Classic mode, answer 20 questions without game over on 20 questions mode or play against the clock on Arcade mode. Quizoid won't make you a millionaire but for sure improves your education.

Like the well known "Who wants to be a millionaire?" and other trivia games, Quizoid offers 3 lifelines to help you out with difficult questions. Use the well-known Fifty-fifty, get a second guess or swap a question for another of your favorite category to fill the gaps in your knowledge.

There's much to learn from these 17 quiz categories: 

• Art & Literature, 
• Astronomy & Space, 
• Chemistry, 
• Entertainment, 
• Famous People, 
• Food & Beverage, 
• General Knowledge, 
• Geography, 
• History, 
• Language, 
• Mathematics, 
• Medical Sience, 
• Nature, 
• Politics, 
• Religion, 
• Science & Technology and 
• Sports.

Unlike many other trivia apps Quizoid is playable offline anytime. Take it with you on a road trip or play a quick game while you are on the sub! Plus: with Quizoid's built-in quiz statistics you can follow your learning progress across all fields of knowledge.

If you're up for a competition, sign in with Goolge Plus to challenge your friends on Quizoid's online leaderboards and to unlock achievments! Furthermore you can send in your own trivia questions via the in game Send question option. Get your knowledge into the quiz!

The game's minimalistic and stylish design helps you stay focused. Choose between a black and a white layout or play the app on landscape mode and cast it to your TV screen!

If you like our trivia game, rate it on the Google Play Store! You can also give this page a +1 on Google Plus! You have something to say? Send us an email to support@habanero-apps.de! Your feedback is highly appreciated.

If this free quiz isn't difficult enough and you want more, try Quizoid Pro! It comes with 2,600 additional questions PLUS 2 new game modes: Category mode and Pro mode. Download here: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=de.habanero.quizoidpro

Get SMART with your PHONE!

Follow us on Facebook or Twitter:
https://www.facebook.com/Quizoid
https://www.twitter.com/HabaneroApps

title: Backpacker™ - Travel Trivia Game
description:
Your bag is packed and you’re ready to go, but as fate has it, you’re stranded in Rome with only 500 coins in your pocket. What now?

Show the world what you’re made of in Backpacker, a new globetrotting trivia game! 
Save up enough money to continue your travels by going on various missions and applying for odd jobs! 
At the end of each day, either splurge on a hotel or risk sleeping in the streets. 
Discover new cities and maybe even learn a thing or two along the way.

Backpacker Features

* Test your trivia skills!        
* See the world, one city at a time!
* Complete your memento collection with tokens from each city! 
* Collect job diplomas and earn cash for traveling!        
* Help strangers around the world for secret rewards!

descriptionHTML:
Your bag is packed and you’re ready to go, but as fate has it, you’re stranded in Rome with only 500 coins in your pocket. What now?

Show the world what you’re made of in Backpacker, a new globetrotting trivia game!
Save up enough money to continue your travels by going on various missions and applying for odd jobs!
At the end of each day, either splurge on a hotel or risk sleeping in the streets.
Discover new cities and maybe even learn a thing or two along the way.

Backpacker Features

* Test your trivia skills!
* See the world, one city at a time!
* Complete your memento collection with tokens from each city!
* Collect job diplomas and earn cash for traveling!
* Help strangers around the world for secret rewards!
* Stamp your passport in each city, can you collect them all?
* Which mini game will become your new favourite?"

Conquer the world, become a Backpacker!

Backpacker has been lovingly created, we take fun seriously.

We really value your feedback, go to www.facebook.com/BackpackerGame and say what's on your mind!

More about WeAreQiiwi Interactive at www.qiiwi.com
summary: 🗺️ Show the world what you’re made of in this globetrotting trivia game! 🗺️

title: True False Quiz
description:
True or False is a brain teasing trivia quiz game. In this game, you need to decide whether the statements are true or false. There are many different categories of questions and several interesting and challenging game modes for 1-4 players. You can always choose the right quiz mode for you! Test your brain right now!

Main features:
* Huge number of interesting questions.
* 7 different question categories(History, Geography, Science, Culture, Sport, Nature and Other)
* Survival Quiz.
* 60+ interesting challenges.
* Split Screen for 2 - 4 players.
* Add new question feature.
*Opportunity to Share interesting facts and your score with your friends.
*Excellent graphics and animations.
*Engaging sound effects.
*Global Scoring Support.

The True or False quiz game features a few different game modes.

Single player is designed for one player. You can choose from one of two different single player quiz types.

*Survival Quiz
Player starts the survival quiz with three lives.  The player has to correctly respond to questions. For each question, the player has only 20 seconds to decide whether the statement is true or false.  If the player’s answer is wrong or his time is up, he loses one of his lives. In case of 5 right answers in a row, the player will get one additional life. 

*Challenges
This is a perfect one for those of you who love challenges. There are several different maps with dozens of challenges. Various challenges will test the player’s knowledge in a number of areas. 

SPLIT SCREEN
Split screen is a fun and entertaining quiz for 2-4 players.  Several players compete against one another.

True or False can also be very helpful for the education of your children.
True or False is without a doubt one of the best intellectual and fun trivia games on the market. You will learn many diverse and interesting facts about topics you wouldn’t have even imagined.

title: Factual Quiz 2018: Challenging Trivia [Offline]
description:
Factual Quiz is a fun and challenging multiple choice Quiz/Trivia/GK and it's totally free. You can find over 1000s of questions in lots of different topics, and new topics are added regularly so you won’t have to worry about ever running out of trivia to test your general knowledge(GK) on. So, How many questions can you solve?


► Factual Quiz Features: ◄

★ FREE: Factual Quiz is completely free to try! Just tap the download button and start playing! 
★ HOURS OF FUN: Has thousands of beautifully illustrated questions.
★ HUGE VARIETY OF TOPICS: Ranging from current pop culture to obscure scientific facts, and everything in between.
★ GAME STATS & HIGH-SCORES: Get detailed statistics and high scores. 
★ GREAT FOR LEARNING: Various educational topics for those who want to brush up on their vocabulary, spelling or foreign languages
★ SHARPEN YOUR MIND: Give each question your best shot. Some question are easy, but others will take some thinking! 
★ SO! MUCH! FUN!


► The questions are frequently updated! At the moment the questions are divided into the following categories: ◄

★ Art
★ Bible
★ Celebrity
★ Geography
★ History
★ Holiday
★ Literary
★ Movies
★ Music
★ Politics
★ Science
★ Sports
★ TV
★ War

-----------------------------------------------------------------
Unlike many other trivia games Factual Quiz is playable offline anytime. Take it with you in the car, on the metro or play a quick game while you are waiting for the bus.

Please send us any comments you have. Please help us make Factual Quiz, the best free (for ever) trivia quiz in the world! Thank you!

title: True or False? Trivia Quiz!
description:
Be warned, there's no fancy graphics here, just a good challenge, some fun and a lot of educational trivia.
You can play by yourself or with a friend on a split screen, for a few seconds or a few hours.
There are achievements to unlock and a global leaderboard via Google Play Games.
You can submit your own questions (they will be reviewed).
And more will be added over time.
It's free, lightweight, bugless, can be played offline and there's no intrusive permission required.
Not enough? You can also play against someone over the Internet in real time. Yes, real time quiz.
Actually, the only problem is that you might get addicted, now you know.

If you were looking for a more "useful" time waster, you've just found it!

Nota Bene: this quiz does not contain "alternative facts", all the questions have been thoroughly checked. Let's make America cultivated again!

title: Liv and Maddie Quiz
description:
Liv and Maddie Quiz is an unofficial game in which you will find drawings of your favorite Liv and Maddie characters and you will have to write their names correctly.

The images have small modifications, so that only the most fans of the series can guess all the characters.

If you do not remember the name of a character in the series, you can ask a friend for help or use the hints.

The game has more than 50 levels, with beautiful color drawings of characters that were present in different chapters of the 4 seasons.


CHARACTERISTICS:

- The game has more than 50 levels with main characters and guests of Liv and Maddie.

- The names of the characters are in their original language (English).

- If you complete all the levels you can leave us a comment asking for updates.


DISCLAIMER

This is UNOFFICIAL game of Liv and Maddie, inspired by the TV series, created by fans for fans of the series.

title: The Wall: Evolution
description:
the wall Evolution is a quiz game, there is a wall from which balls fall and enter containers with different payouts

The bottom of the board is divided into 15 slots marked with various dollar amounts, some of which increase as the game progresses. Seven numbered "drop zones" are centered at the top of the board (above the center seven slots), from which balls can be dropped into play.

A team of two contestants plays (one is virtual) each game, with a potential top prize of $12,000,000 (virtual) Green balls dropped on the board will add to the team's bank, while red balls dropped on the board will subtract from it. Throughout the game, the bank has a floor of $0.

"The Wall Evolution" is now also available in Evolution and Roullette versions:

In the Evolution version there are particular balls, like the electric one or bomb, and many other variables like the dynamic barriers and teleporters

In the Roullette version the questions are replaced by a wheel that turns and gives away lots of emotions, this version is suitable for those who do not like to play trivia games or children who still do not read yet.

Download now The Wall Evolution,  the best quiz game and trivia game

title: Words to Emojis – Best Emoji Guessing Quiz Game
description:
Guess the emojis that suit the given sentence and score! In this trivia quiz, there will be smileys 😀 sad faces 🙁 tears of joy 😂 and many more! The words may require emoji objects like pineapples🍍, cars 🏎️ and activities like working out🏋️. Experience the best trivia, guess the emoji game that resembles real life situations. Play with friends and family in realtime multiplayer global challenge. Guess the emoji and have fun playing Words To Emojis!

👉 Power-up your Brain! 💬
Words to Emojis doesn’t require just your knowledge to match the emojis with the words and create the sentence. It also requires to do it fast, because the faster you do it the more you score and earn coin rewards. The coins earn you hints so try to get as many as possible. So, remember the emojis, solve more trivia questions and power-up your emoji guessing capability. Words to Emojis is the best rated guess the emoji game with a perfect combination of emoji trivia & emoji quiz.

🏁 CAN YOU PASS ALL LEVELS?! 🔝
Words To Emojis is based on levels. If you solve the find the emojis level you go to the next one. Can you pass all of our levels which can get hard as you pass through? Test your messaging & emoji game knowledge in one of the most challenging and visually appealing trivia games!

😉 Words to Emojis FEATURES:  🔡
✅ Designed for casual players, kids, and fun loving thinkers who love to solve trivia quiz with family and friends!
✅ Easy to play find the emoji game anytime anywhere.. even while watching an Avengers movie! ;-)
✅ Start your guess the emoji game on any mobile device and continue on Facebook and vice versa.
✅ Hints and Instant Solve, to help you to always make progress, without getting stuck in any level
✅ Over 1400 Levels, with entertaining stages (level packs) such as Hollywood Movies pack, Foods pack, Sports pack (loaded with levels on cricket, soccer, baseball, hockey and more!), English Music / Songs pack, Friendship, Love, History, Brain Teaser and a lot more!
✅ Share / Brag your progress with friends and family
✅ Socialize by sharing the question on Facebook / WhatsApp / Instagram / Twitter and other popular social networks
✅ Earn free coins by watching video Ads or by completing game levels
✅ Test your luck with an addictive spin the wheel mini game and win jackpot of coins!
✅ Challenge friends and brag your Guess the emojis and trivia skills in the brand new Global Challenge Multiplayer mode.
✅ No registration or signup required.. just start and have fun!

------------------------------------
Solve and become the world emoji quiz master.
Get this great trivia game for FREE!
Best game for all the Emoji and Movie lovers!
Discover the deeper meaning of emojis!
Play Words to Emojis with friends and family!
Experience ultimate trivia quiz in the most challenging multiplayer mode!

Join the Words to Emojis fan page on Faceebok: https://www.facebook.com/wordstoemojis/

title: Sorting Hat Pro
description:
Ultimate Sorting Hat app with lots of magical games! This is the new and improved version of Sorting Hat App. It contains new games, qualifying exams, wizard name and many more with magical Hogwarts express and is absolutely free.

Have you ever dreamed of going to "Hogwarts School of Wizards and Wizardry"? Have you waited for years for the letter from Hogwarts and didn't get it? Do you still believe there's a wizard in you? Do you fancy going to Hogwarts school and be in one of the four Magical houses? Do you want to cast a spell with your wand from "Ollivanders wand shop"? Have you ever felt what would your wand look like? Have you ever felt the urge to cast the "Patronus" charm and repel "Dementors"? Well, I have a good news folks. This app will fulfill all your wishes. Just answer the questions truthfully as you feel like and the magical app will sort you into one of the Hogwarts house, give you the wand and you can discover your own patronus. Be sure to be loud and clear while casting a spell.:)

Re-live the magical moment of Harry Potter world. Use this app to be sorted into one of the Hogwarts House. Just answer the questions and let the magical sorting hat do the rest.

Find your wand. Just answer the questions and specific detail of the wand will be provide to you.

Discover your own Patronus. Cast a patronus charm to repel the demetors. Just think of the happiest and powerful memory while doing so.

Now, five new exciting games added. Test your knowledge on Harry Potter world. Guess the Harry Potter movie name and character's name based on the emoticons. Sort out the characters to the house and play the role of Sorting hat. Test your knowledge on spells. And finally go on the adventure to find answer to the puzzling questions and the fun fact hint lies in the previous questions. :) 

Play the games and enjoy. :)

Spread the news! Let the magic begin!

title: Just Like Mom and Dad Game
description:
** You must have an active internet connection to play this game! **

If left alone in an ice cream parlor, would your sister pig out on Rocky Road, Strawberry Cheesecake or Mint Chocolate Chip? If your dad won a million dollars would he take
travel to outer space, go on a jungle safari or buy a new bathing suit and relax
on a tropical island?

The Just Like Mom and Dad Game is a ‘game show in your pocket’ that allows family members to challenge each other in hilarious and highly personal ways.

Secure and made for players of all ages, the game awards Prize Wheel spins
to families who interact and know each other well! It bridges distances between family members with fun, simple challenges and personalized avatars. 

Each member of families playing the game will build their
relationships by matching answers to challenge questions that test their
knowledge of intimate and ridiculous family-friendly details of their lives.

Playing, learning and laughing together have never been this easy or this much
fun.
Extending the popular TV show this game:
Allows teams as big as your whole family (including uncles, aunts, nephews and grandparents) to play, challenge each other and win together!
Players build and edit their own in-game character! 
Awards players who match answers with prize wheel spins!

Hundreds of Questions!  


How to Play:

Create your family account and add members!

Create your in-game character!

Issue challenges to your family members and match answers to win!

Spin the Prize Wheel and collect prizes!

Mom is busy pampering baby Matt, which  makes Baby Hazel feel lone and left out. But mom understand that Hazel is upset so she decides to pamper her little princess with a royal bath. Mom is busy attending the needs of baby Matt and have no time to entertain Baby Hazel. This makes her feel sad and lone. Can you with Baby Hazel and fulfill her needs?

title: Guess Brand Logos
description:
You come across these world brand logos every day but how many of them will you recognize?

Let's see if you can guess them all!

• SIMPLE AND ADDICTIVE •

Countless world brand logos are waiting for you!

Guess Brand Logos starts off easily but becomes more challenging as you progress through the game and recognize more international logos that crop up aspects of our everyday lives.

• INSTANT FUN •

-▸ Guess the logo displayed on screen by filling in available letters
-▸ Ask friends for help on Facebook, Twitter or Instagram
-▸ If you get stuck you can use the following hints:
    - Reveal a letter
    - Remove letters (all which are not part of the solution) 
    - Skip to next level
-▸ Out of coins? Buy more in the shop or earn free coins easily in game

We constantly improve the game based on your reviews, please let us know anything you like, don't like or what you would like us to add into the game!

• CONTINUOUS UPDATES •

Over 550 levels with professionally edited logos to guess with more coming soon! Download and have fun!

title: Name That Disney Movie - Free Triva Game
description:
Name That Disney Movie - Free Triva Game

MORE NEW QUESTION EVERY WEEK !!!

This is a game for Disney lovers
Do you Think you know all the Disney movies there are? 
The one from current Disney movie hits to Disney cartoon classics? 
Check if you're a true Disney fanatic by testing your Disney Trivia knowledge in Name That Disney Movie! The free quiz game!

Challenge your friends to see who knows the most Disney characters or ask them for help if you get stuck on a level.
Challenge yourself with this all-encompassing trivia game on Disney movies. From the early Disney movies like The little mermaid, the princess and the frog, frozen, Alice, pooh, sleeping beauty, lion king, Snow White and Pinocchio to recent film like Cars 3 and Coco, this game covers it all.

Guess the Disney Character is a fun guessing-game
Guess the Disney character is an entertaining game of questions and answers with which you sure have hours of fun guaranteed. 
In this you will have to guess the names of the different personages of series and films of Disney

BEST OF THE BEST DISNEY MOVIE QUIZ (UNOFFICIAL) FOR REAL FANS

Hello, Princess or Knight!

Are you real fans of disney movies?
Don't say it if you can not prove that you are a real fan of Disney productions
Challange yourself to guess your favorites Disney cartoon movies

Show your friends that you know all the facts about Walt Disney, every production, princess and fairy tale
Guess disney characters will challanege you test your knowledge about wall disney movie

Install this awesome Trivia app, play the game, read the questions and try to answer them. 
How much do you remember about this beautiful universe?

How much score you will get?
Don't forget to share the score with your friends to see who's the biggest fan of the world of Disney.

Download our Quiz now and show us what you've got! 
ENjoy the quiz!

This game has many categories and huge question
Don't worry we will add more question so you can upgrade your skill and knowledge

How to play
1. Select categories
2. Answer every question
3. Skip question if you are not sure about the answer
4. Select 50:50 to remove 50% of answer option
5. Get the score

Features:
1. Unlimited Categories & Questions
2. Question Timer, Sound, Vibration

title: Owards Trivia
description:
Do you love playing trivia? With Owards Trivia, you can play to win real items like gift cards and other prizes from popular brands by competing in tournaments. If you're the player with the highest score at the time the tournament ends, you win the item for free! Don't worry if you didn't come in first. Almost everyone wins with Owards Trivia. Winners can shop and choose from tons of popular items. Your tokens will allow you to keep playing or get great discounts on of other products like Sony headphones, gift cards or hotel stays.  

Owards Trivia is not a game of chance as there is no systemic chance involved in any of the elements of Owards Trivia. The questions and the order of the questions are presented in the same fashion to all players.

title: ¿Me Conoces? -  Preguntas Para Amigos Y Parejas
description:
Usando preguntas, "¿Me Conoces? - Preguntas Para Amigos Y Parejas" Te dice cuánto te conocen tus amig@s y pareja.
Rápido uso gracias al sistema que guarda una especie de perfil con las respuestas, para que solo tengas que dar el móvil a un amigo o pareja.

"¿Me Conoces? - Preguntas Para Amigos Y Parejas" Cuenta con 100 preguntas distintas, divididas en dos categorías: Amigos y Pareja. 
También cuenta con una interfaz bastante amigable, como si fuese un chat.

No hace falta darle en móvil a tu amig@ o pareja y que responda 50 de golpe, puedes elegir entre preguntar 10, 30 o 50.

Averigua cuánto te conocen tus amig@s y pareja con "¿Me Conoces? - Preguntas Para Amigos Y Parejas" gracias a su estadística post-pregunta, donde podrás saber cuántas ha acertado y fallado tu amig@ o pareja, ¡PERO ESPERA! Aún hay más, también puedes ver que preguntas ha fallado.

A parte, ¿Me Conoces? cuenta con una funcionalidad Online que permite responder preguntas de tus amigos o pareja sin necesidad que usen tu móvil, y sin necesidad que estén cerca tuya.

Características:
- Posibilidad de jugar sin estar uno al lado del otro
- Preguntas divididas en dos categorías (amigos, parejas)
- 100 preguntas (50 para amigos y 50 para parejas)
- Sistema opcional para comprobar cuántas preguntas ha fallado
- Sistema opcional para comprobar que preguntas ha fallado

No olvides apoyarnos compartiendo esta App con familiares y amigos!!

title: Guess The Lyrics All Genres
descriptionHTML:
Are you ready for the funniest "trivia quiz game"? Let's test your knowledge of all the popular "music genres" with “Guess The Lyrics All Genres”! Test your music IQ of the lyrics from rock, rap, r&b, pop music and much more! Spin the wheel of music, listen to the best music ever made and answer all the “lyrics trivia questions” in this “free music quiz for kids” and adults! Popular “music trivia quiz" will put your music knowledge of lyrics to the test! Get this “free music lyrics app" and check out how good you are at recognizing popular lyrics! Challenge yourself and all your friends who like music!

* Choose one of 4 offered answers;
* There are 5 levels of difficulty in the endless quiz questions and answers;
* Give the answer quickly and win extra points for being fast;
* If you give 3 incorrect answers, you will have to start again;
* If you have problems answering “all genres lyrics trivia quiz questions”, you can ask for 3 types of help:
1) 50:50 – remove two incorrect answers;
2) Switch your question with another one;
3) Use the help of your friends – take a look at their answers shown in percents.

What is your favorite music genre? Is it hip hop or maybe rock? Or pop? Find the lyrics from your favorite music genre and answer all the “music trivia questions” related to it in Guess The Lyrics All Genres quiz for all music lovers! Learn about this popular topic in an interesting and fun way! Download this fun “trivia game” and spend countless hours with your tablets and smartphones playing the “trivia quiz” that broadens your imagination and fills your brain with “music knowledge”!

Get this awesome “lyrics app” and have the time of your life! Check out our fun music quiz questions and see how well you know famous musician, bands and their lyrics. With this interactive “all music genres quiz” you'll have a great time playing with or against your friends!
“Lyrics trivia quizzes” are good for teenagers, adults and even seniors! This “free brain – teaser” will keep you entertained for a long time with some easy quiz questions as you progress to those more difficult ones! You can learn new things while waiting for a bus or coming back home from work or school! Install this “lyrics quiz” for free on your smartphone or tablet and answer all these quick quiz questions! This is a great opportunity for teenage girls and boys as well as adults to revise some already acquainted popular lyrics and to learn some new ones! This “free all genres quiz trivia game” will definitely make your day! Sit back, relax and quiz it up even today!

This brain exercising quiz trivia is the right place for those who never have enough and who always ask for more! Download Guess The Lyrics All Genres and tell your friends about this mobile app and compete against them or against random people from all over the world! Be rewarded for how well you know “all genres lyrics” and provide answers to all “music lyrics trivia questions” in the quiz!
summary:
Interesting music trivia quiz
Tons of lyrics questions on all music genres

title: History Trivia Quiz
description:
Are you ready for a new history trivia challenge? Download our new History Trivia Quiz and test your world history knowledge for free! 

New history questions are finally on your way, so don’t miss out our new History Trivia Quiz! This is a new global history game for all history lovers. It’s a highly educational quiz game that can give you a lot regarding the world history. History Trivia Quiz is also a free app and it’s only a few clicks away, so what are you waiting for? Go get it and start playing NOW! 

World history knowledge: we created a quiz game about world history which means that you will get history questions about the history of various countries of the world, famous leaders and historical events from the entire globe, and then you get to read interesting history TRIVIA facts on each of them. Amazing, right? 

HISTORY TRIVIA QUIZ GAME FEATURES:

➞ LANGUAGE: this history quiz game is available in Croatian, English, French, German, Italian, Portuguese, Russian, Serbian and Spanish
➞  HINTS - if you get stuck on a certain trivia question, a hint can be of help OR you can
➞  SKIP QUESTION , free quiz questions can be skipped. Lose one life and move to the next history trivia question
➞  HEARTS are your lives, each incorrect answer is one heart less
➞  ASK A FRIEND for help if you run out of all hints
➞ FUN FACTS follow every history quiz question and give you a chance to read the most interesting information! 
➞  CERTIFICATE - you get it once you answer all world history trivia questions and answers!

* MODERN HISTORY QUIZ: Test yourself on American history and U.S. presidents! Learn about French History, Kings of France and French revolution! Read about the role of Germany in World Wars, inform yourself more on Italian History, British monarchy and dynasties, Chinese empire and history of Japan! All in one!

* ANCIENT HISTORY QUIZ: We didn’t forget the ancient worlds as well as the ancient civilizations that were the foundation of today’s history. Answer questions about Babylon and Mesopotamia, read trivia facts about the Aztec empire, the code of Hammurabi, and so many others. 

It’s trivia quiz: Answer world trivia HISTORY questions so you can read some amazing history TRIVIA facts!

History is a “must-know” if you want to be well-informed and educated. It is a part of general knowledge, so if you want to be an emancipated individual, you have to know something about it. That’s why we created this smartphone app, so you can learn and read anytime on your Android™ phone, and play it whenever you want. This history quiz is a new educational game that can really inform you and help you expand your world history knowledge. It is also one of the best entertainment apps that you’re going to adore completely.
It’s only a few clicks away, so, download History Trivia Quiz and challenge yourself for free, now!

descriptionHTML:
Are you ready for a new history trivia challenge? Download our new History Trivia Quiz and test your world history knowledge for free!

New history questions are finally on your way, so don’t miss out our new History Trivia Quiz! This is a new global history game for all history lovers. It’s a highly educational quiz game that can give you a lot regarding the world history. History Trivia Quiz is also a free app and it’s only a few clicks away, so what are you waiting for? Go get it and start playing NOW!

World history knowledge: we created a quiz game about world history which means that you will get history questions about the history of various countries of the world, famous leaders and historical events from the entire globe, and then you get to read interesting history TRIVIA facts on each of them. Amazing, right?

HISTORY TRIVIA QUIZ GAME FEATURES:

➞ LANGUAGE: this history quiz game is available in Croatian, English, French, German, Italian, Portuguese, Russian, Serbian and Spanish
➞ HINTS - if you get stuck on a certain trivia question, a hint can be of help OR you can
➞ SKIP QUESTION , free quiz questions can be skipped. Lose one life and move to the next history trivia question
➞ HEARTS are your lives, each incorrect answer is one heart less
➞ ASK A FRIEND for help if you run out of all hints
➞ FUN FACTS follow every history quiz question and give you a chance to read the most interesting information!
➞ CERTIFICATE - you get it once you answer all world history trivia questions and answers!

* MODERN HISTORY QUIZ: Test yourself on American history and U.S. presidents! Learn about French History, Kings of France and French revolution! Read about the role of Germany in World Wars, inform yourself more on Italian History, British monarchy and dynasties, Chinese empire and history of Japan! All in one!

* ANCIENT HISTORY QUIZ: We didn’t forget the ancient worlds as well as the ancient civilizations that were the foundation of today’s history. Answer questions about Babylon and Mesopotamia, read trivia facts about the Aztec empire, the code of Hammurabi, and so many others.

It’s trivia quiz: Answer world trivia HISTORY questions so you can read some amazing history TRIVIA facts!

History is a “must-know” if you want to be well-informed and educated. It is a part of general knowledge, so if you want to be an emancipated individual, you have to know something about it. That’s why we created this smartphone app, so you can learn and read anytime on your Android™ phone, and play it whenever you want. This history quiz is a new educational game that can really inform you and help you expand your world history knowledge. It is also one of the best entertainment apps that you’re going to adore completely.
It’s only a few clicks away, so, download History Trivia Quiz and challenge yourself for free, now!

title: Bubble Shooter
description:
Play the brand new bubble popping game today, hit the balls, and discover one of the most fun games to play! It’s the classic and addictive bubble shooter ™ game with a twist - plenty of exciting new puzzles and challenges. Play for free, hit the bubbles and win levels!

Think you can score? let’s test your matching skills in this game - shoot bubbles with numbers, calculate your steps to reach the goal in every level. Play online or offline - there is no wifi and no internet needed in this bubble shooter ™ game!

Play this unique trivia game to develop your mathematical skills anytime and anywhere for free. We want to ensure that you’ll get the most entertaining experience and enjoy the most innovative features. So take aim and blast away all the balls in this colorful retro-style adventure!

Brain Training Games: Test your skills and reach the level target. Train your brain and solve all the puzzles.
Play & Win: Overcome different challenges and complete missions. 
Classic Gameplay: Enjoy a classic and addicting game mode.
Share the Fun: Play with family and friends and have a blast!

Develop your thinking skills and enjoy unique and fun puzzles and challenges. Smash all the bubbles to clear the board and move on to the next challenge. This Bubble Shooter ™ retro game is perfect for families to play and enjoy so make sure to get started today.

Reach the goal in this all-new balloon shooting game:
There are random numbers inside the balls. Your mission is to reach the goal of the level by collecting and adding the numbers inside the bubbles. Can you shoot and pop the bubbles, reach the target, and clear the level?

How to Play:
* Drag your finger to move the laser sight in the direction of the bubbles and lift your finger to shoot balloons.
* Explore thousands of amazing levels.
* Try getting three stars by reaching high scores.
* Pop numbers inside the balls to reach the goal of the level.
* Warm up your fingers and prepare for some bubble popping fun!
* Enjoy the classic and retro gameplay with no wifi and no internet needed.
* Pop the balls, and win coins, boosters, and gifts!
* Special boosters featuring: A Fireball and a Bomb that will help you blast and clear groups of bubbles and win levels.

Upgrade your Bubble Shooter ™ Gaming Experience:
Earn and unlock powerful boosters that will help you hit, pop and explode all the colorful balls and level up.

Bubble Shooter ™ is a perfect free brain training game!
Pop bubbles according to a target score, and try to beat the challenges and solve all the riddles. Thousands of fun and relaxing levels are waiting to be solved, so you better start playing! You can swap bubbles for free, just tap on your bubble to change its color. Make sure to plan your shots and work out a strategy to pop all the colored balloons.
Pop, smash, and explode colorful balloons, win amazing gifts and prizes, and complete thousands of challenging fun levels in this cool bubble shooter ™ free game.

This Bubble Shooter ™ shooting bubbles game is very relaxing, addictive and super easy to learn. Hours of endless fun are guaranteed!


All rights of Bubble Shooter ™ are owned by Ilyon Dynamics Ltd.

title: The Flash Quiz ⚡️
description:
Are you a big fan of the Flash series?
Do you know all the characters?

Take this fun quiz, you have several reasons to do it:

▪️ 50 levels
▪️ Main characters
▪️ Earn coins and buy advice.
▪️ Awesome design and game.
▪️ FREE!

The Flash is an American superhero television series. It is based on the Comics character Barry Allen / Flash, a costumed superhero crime-fighter with the power to move at superhuman speeds. It is a spin-off from Arrow, existing in the same fictional universe. The series follows Allen, a crime scene investigator who gains super-human speed, which he uses to fight criminals, including others who have also gained superhuman abilities.

Tags: Flash point, metahumans, TV, Season, episodes, run
