title: English Grammar - Quiz Games
description:
English Grammar - Quiz Games are not like English teaching apps for elementary students! Take the English level test in a form of English quiz games!

🔥 Fun learning games
🔥 Cool quiz games
🔥 Learn Languages

Students and teachers! Are you interested in improving English writing, reading, and speaking? Improve English vocabulary and grammar of all levels with English Grammar - Quiz Games! If you think that articles and prepositions are tricky, try ESL activities that will clear it all up for you! Learning English tenses requires concentration and constant practice. But with complete English grammar exercises app, you will also be entertained! All the English grammar exercise for practice with answers in our English quiz questions general knowledge are fun and encouraging! Win the points (coins) as you answer the questions and learn a foreign language without trouble!

🤬📚📖🔖📌🖍📝🔠🔡

Revise and get a progress check or just stay well informed! Choose the right answer and improve your knowledge without a tutor! ESL games for adults let you challenge yourself and learn something new everyday! Get a memory boost with fun quizes and tests! Review answers after taking effortless English test with vocabulary quiz – it's the best way to remember and memorize words, constructions and rules! Answer quiz questions and answers as you acquire the most common phrases for daily use in conversation. When to use 'will' and 'going to'? Present Perfect or Past Simple? Learn the difference w/ English Grammar - Quiz Games! 

🤬📚📖🔖📌🖍📝🔠🔡

➜ How to be fluent in English? Do a placement test and check your level of proficiency! And don't worry about the errors! You can use hints that will remove a false answer and help you guess the correct solution! Play the ultimate English grammar quiz and learn how to express yourself as a native speaker!

English Grammar - Quiz Games options: 
➜ If the answer is correct, it will be highlighted in green!
➜ The wrong answer will have a red highlight and you’ll be shown the corrections!
➜ Enjoyable gameplay with endless mode or time mode
➜ Follow your progress on the leaderboard of English language games!
➜ Watch a video to earn coins in English grammar games for adults!
➜ Helpful hints – remove the wrong answer or skip the question
➜ Finish the sentences and Fill in the blanks English grammar exercises.
➜ 20 seconds to answer each question in English Grammar - Quiz Games
🔥🔥
How to get smarter every day and boost memory? Get a useful study helper where you can both play and learn! Great as a leisure activity, these time passing games for teenagers are also found in the category of educational apps for adults! Are you ready to participate in a challenging English spelling quiz app? Be the smartest spelling bee and go to the next level -  English vocabulary quiz!

Seeking for a job in American or British English speaking community? Do you need fun games to learn English for adults? Test your knowledge – are you at a beginner, intermediate, or advanced level? Trivia quiz games for teaching English and brain teasers challenge your brain and IQ! Improve your general knowledge of verb tenses, phrasal verbs, word order, collocations etc. Skip the expensive courses and pass English grammar test with answers like a pro! Get a grammar check and get an A in a vocabulary test! A fun way to hone your language skills  - correct misspellings or bad word choice in this English learning app! Improve IQ in free time!

Getting tired of your textbook? How to stay motivated when you’re bored? Throw away English dictionary and try a fun way to learn! Study irregular verbs, auxiliary verbs and overcome common mistakes with this great app! SHARPEN YOUR MIND  in educational quiz games!

title: Country Music Fun Game Quiz
descriptionHTML:
“Country Music Fun Game Quiz” 2016 is a “music trivia quiz” about one of the most popular music genres in the world – “country music”. Download this “music quiz game” and get tons of "music quiz questions" to amuse yourself in your free time! This “music game” is one of the best free “music brain - teasers”! Test your knowledge about country music artists and their popular songs. Check out how much life facts or fun facts you really know about top music stars of country music. Also, see how good you are at country song lyrics – can you recognize the song or the singer by only a few lines? “Picture quizzes” are excellent for your memory! This is exactly one such “trivia game”, in which you can find pictures of your favorite country music singers! "Guess the music artist", "guess the band" or guess the song – pick one of four offered answers and do it quickly to earn bonus points! If you like listening to some most famous performers of country music and playing spare – time – filling music trivia games, you'll definitely enjoy playing this "free quiz game"! Tell your friends about great opportunity to play this fun and interesting music trivia quiz that could easily become their pastime!

➜ 5 levels of difficulty in the endless quiz questions and answers;
➜ Play “country music quiz”, choose one of 4 offered answers and do it fast, the clock is ticking;
➜ Give the answer quickly and win extra points for being fast;
➜ Be careful not to make three errors in a row or else you'll have to start over;
➜ Use one of 3 available helps to solve the questions:
**50:50 – remove two incorrect answers;
**Switch your question with another one;
**Use the help of your friends – take a look at their answers shown in percent.

If you feel excited about checking your knowledge on country music and you want to have fun at the same time, we have a perfect trivia quiz for you! This brain – teaser will tickle your curiosity and help you develop into a real music connoisseur! Country Music Fun Game Quiz 2016 has everything you need! A multitude of pictures, famous singers, bands, songs, lyrics and all the interesting facts about the private lives of the country music stars! Tons of easy trivia questions are awaiting you as you progress to those more difficult ones! Answer all the quiz questions in this awesome quiz trivia and earn the title of “country music quizzes” champion! Everything you like about the world of country music is now available to you via this astonishing trivia quiz! Have fun with your friends and family as you spend some quality time with them answering trivia quiz questions while you take rest from every day chores! “Music quizzes” are the right places for those who want to learn and have fun at the same time. This is a must - have trivia game for all trivia quiz lovers! This great “game trivia quiz” will get your brain cells warmed up and make you forget about everything that bothers you! The quiz trivia questions will boost your music IQ and the pictures from this trivia game will help you memorize some of the best country music performers!


If you are addicted to playing “music games” and “knowledge boosters”, you will definitely be delighted with this “music trivia game for kids” and adults! Download Country Music Fun Game Quiz 2016 for Android TM, and answer correctly all of the quiz trivia questions in this music quiz and to do it fast in order to earn extra points!

title: Classic Rock Quiz (Free)
description:
A fun classic rock music trivia quiz brimming with questions about the greatest rock music and bands from the 60s, 70s and 80s. This trivia quiz covers the best-selling artists of all time such including Led Zeppelin, AC/DC, The Who, Guns N' Roses, Van Halen, Black Sabbath, Queen, Alice Cooper, Motley Crue, Aerosmith, Eagles, Bruce Springsteen, Bon Jovi, The Rolling Stones, Iron Maiden, Eric Clapton, The Kinks, Jimi Hendrix, Pink Floyd, The Beatles, Tom Petty, Deep Purple, Rush, Thin Lizzy, The Band, Bryan Adams, Foreigner, Skid Row, Boston, Dire Straits, Journey and many many more.


Test your knowledge about the greatest vocal, guitar, bass, drum and keyboard (& bagpipe) music ever created. 


It is simple to play - just answer classic rock questions correctly.


Games Modes:

Classic Quiz
Levels Quiz
Everlasting Quiz
Beat the Clock Quiz
Battle of the Bands Competition, 
Hangman (Free Bonus Feature), 
Codebreakers (Free Bonus Feature), 

Achievements to gain and High-Score Leaderboards to record your best scores.


There are ZERO in-app purchases and ZERO locked content as I don't believe in asking users to pay to progress.


This version does contain adverts as a way of keeping this app FREE to the user. If you prefer, there is an ad-free version of the app available. See my store listing below to download.


I add questions periodically. Latest addition - 21 Jan 2018.


This quiz has been a real labor of love to create.  If you enjoy playing then please provide a 5* rating.  If there are any problems with the appearance or function of the app then please contact me at appquizzes@gmail.com and I will do my best to rectify them.  I hope you enjoy playing.  Keep on rocking !!

title: Pixel Painter
description:
Pixel Art Online!
Become the best painter in the universe in this colorful online game! 
Do you like drawing and playing charades? Then this game is for you! Kids love to draw, so we made the best drawing app for kids! 

How to play Draw and Guess mode? 
- Choose the word
- Draw it so the others could guess it
- Try to guess the word if you are not drawing

How to play the Battle of Painters mode:

The round starts and you get given a theme, the goal is to make a drawing based on the given theme in 5 minutes using a bunch of tools like pencil, eraser, spray, square and circle shapes, line, bomb(erases everything), undo and redo tools. But you are not alone: other players are drawing their paintings in front of you! There is a voting for the best picture after the round is over. The painting with the most votes wins the game!

Controls:
- Click and hold to perform an action

Do you like pixels, cubes, and voxels? Then download this game and enjoy 
- Lots of different player skins
- Different girl skins
- Different boy skins
- Fun gameplay
- Battle of painters
- Charades aka Draw and Guess
- Paint and share your doodle with the growing community
- Many colors to choose from

Music by Kubbi http://www.kubbimusic.com/

description:
Guess the brand from hundreds of logos and icons! This is another hi guess the brand game with levels you can walk through without any restrictions!

Playing is pretty simple: Just walk through the logos in levels, take one logo and you're shown a series of scrambled letters, out of which you have to make a word that you associate with the logo. As the creator of Logo Quiz, Icomania, and 4 pics 1 word, we now present you the new puzzle adventure - Guess The Brand - Logo Quiz! Download the top trending game on the market for free and begin the icon mania right now!

title: Guess the character of Descendants 2
description:
Do you think you know everything about the movie of descendants 2? Do you think you can complete all the levels of this trivia? Try it!

Guess Descendants is a great application of questions and answers based on the fun and charming films that undoubtedly have marked importance in regard to films of princesses and evil characters. In this trivia you will find characters like:
-Wrong
-Evie
-Ben
-Carlos
-Malefica
-Audrey
And all the other characters that appear in any of the movies!

Game features:
-More than 35 levels with different characters from Descendants 2 and some from Descendants 1.
-4 different categories with unique unlockable levels.
-Additional money and rewards
-Possibility to send messages to your friends to receive aid.
-Gana coins and rewards watching videos.

Whats the game about?
This quiz consists in guessing the name of all the characters that appear in this film through an image that contains your photo, silhouette or a characteristic representation of it. You will find the princes and princesses, neutral characters, teachers, coaches and obviously the children of the most evil characters in different movies.

It also has a system of rewards and bonuses to solve levels in which you find difficulties.

How to play?
To play this charming game you will need to just select a level and start pressing the buttons that appear below the images forming the name of the character shown in the photo. You will need to do it correctly to receive rewards and move on to the next level.

No doubt this is a game that will give you a lot to think and remember and that only the true fans and followers of these charismatic evil characters can complete.

title: Spells Book & Quiz Harry Potter
description:
Welcome to Hogwarts.
Do you think that you are a real expert on the magical world of Harry Potter? Come find out!
Spells Book & Quiz Harry Potter is a fun application to learn all spells and curiosities present in books and films.

For the first time you will have a real book of spells to study and become a true magician, learn and listen to the pronunciation of more than 250 spells.

Register by inserting your nickname, select your preferred house and begins to play immediately.

In the Quiz there are 4 different possibilities of responses, choose the correct answer to be able to complete the level without losing gems.
Earn coins overcoming the levels and get upgrades from use in the subsequent levels.

If you want you can send us a question that is not already present inside the quiz.

Whether you're Gryffindor, Ravenclaw, Hufflepuff or Slytherin, Spells Book & Quiz Harry Potter is the right application for you.

There will be constantly new updates to make the application more and more interesting.

Not to be missed! DOWNLOAD IT NOW FREE!

A greeting to all Potterheads.

title: Quiz Royale Online
description:
This content is not affiliated, approved, sponsored or approved specifically by Supercell and Supercell is not responsible for it. For more information, see Supercell Fan Content Policy: www.supercell.com/fan-content-policy.
The multiplayer Clash Royale game is here!
Compete against people from all over the world to find out who has more knowledge about Clash Royale.
You will have different topics to choose from to start competing. Enjoy answering questions with different levels of difficulty.
Quiz Royale Online is a new viral game to enjoy with your friends and family. In this new version you can play with your favorite Clash Royale characters.
Playability:
There are a number of themes to choose from on Clash Royale and Supercell, you can choose your favorites. Once chosen the subject three buttons are presented:
- Batttle: Pressing will search you with another player online to be able to start playing, 5 questions will be presented, the one that wins the most wins.

- Follow: To save the topic.

- Leaderboard: A menu is presented with the top 10 players from around the world.

Some character cards that you can find in this application made by fans:

King
- Giant
- Goblins
- Barbarians
- Arqueras
- Baby Dragon
- Spirit of Ice
- Gentlemen

This trivial style game contains many photos. Are you ready to make difficult decisions? This is a sequel to our popular game: What Do You Prefer for Royale? This either.io game style is played by the vast majority of youtubers who make youtubers life.

CHARACTERISTICS

- Online Game of Questions
- Requires internet connection
- Connect with your facebook account
- Standard game, responds to difficult predictions predicted by our team and other players
- Smash or Pass with many possible options
- Challenge your friends senpai
- Real-time results of questionnaire questions sent by other players
- Track the results of your images

Quiz Royale Online is inspired by youtubers like TheAlvaro845 and WithZack, similar to our other challenge game Would You Rather for Royale! Which was also inspired by them so in case you are one of them please do not hesitate to use this game for your videos.
This app will pass some Clash Royale and Gold jewelry. Perfect for beginners looking to learn how to generate and start earning.

Characteristics:

- 78 Available Cards
- 9 Sands Included from Goblin Stadium to Legendary Arena
- No internet required

This is a non-commercial online application generated by a fan for informational purposes, limited to displaying and identifying Clash Royale as permitted by the Fan Content Policy: www.supercell.com/fan-content-policy.

Translation: 

- Italian: Giovanni Gallo(Steroide Bello)

We really hope you enjoy this new version.

title: Would You Rather? For Adults
description:
Play now the hottest Would You Rather ! Are you ready to answer uncomfortable quiz questions? Or maybe are you super curious about other people opinion? check now would you rather for adults, a new and improved version of the classic would you rather game. 

We have listen you and we have created a bigger and better game, with less glitches and significant better and fluent experience, beautiful graphics and interesting new features to build the new community.

We have picked the best questions to deliver to you, our team have been doing a great job picking the tricky trivia questions. Some of those questions are hard to answer and that's the beauty of this game.

The new comments sections have been totally renovated and adapted to current times. Now you can share your opinion and see others, we would love to see a good and interesting discussion in the comments.

Don't forget to submit your own questions, we are looking forward to see your inputs and contribute on the organic growth of the game. You will be able to track your questions afterwards. 

This game have been translated in multiple language, concretely is available in Spanish, Portuguese, French , German and Italian.

If you are a youtuber , feel free to create your content playing this game. youtubers life is important to us as we believe in the same model.

This game is not suitable for kids, thus we have defined the game with the highest content rating possible. Please is your responsibility to do not let your kids playings this game. Questions are related to love , sex and most of the times strong language is used to describe the conundrums. 

Main features

- Send your trivia and quiz questions (in a similar format like would you prefer and either)
- Challenge your friends with questions about kiki challenge or other popular challenge
- You Laugh You Lose mode: Don't laugh or you lose the game, the funniest mode.

Discover the many surprises in the game, would you rather a momo call or ..? Or are you ready to dance the shiggy challenge anytime the game ask for it? 

As art of our fanbase wanted we have included questions related to fortnight but you can also found questions about other trendings 

We really hope you enjoy playing our game and do no doubt in contact us for any concert.

title: Trivia for Jehovah's Witnesses
description:
A Trivia game for Jehovah's Witnesses.

Thanks to this app you will be able to learn, memorize and remember interesting details about bible books, bible history, scriptures, even Jehovah's Witnesses modern history. 

You will start from the beginning as a new bible student, but soon you will be able to play new levels: unbaptized publisher, baptized publisher, pioneer... you will even be able to go to Gilead!! 

There are also 13 different types of question that you will be able to unlock answering questions and more questions.  

Enjoy and learn with this free game as part of your personal bible study! You can use JW Library to find the answer to the question!

JW Library,

title: MEGA QUIZ GAMING 2K19 - Guess the game Trivia
description:
Enjoy Mega quiz gaming! Guess all the game quiz levels with over 570 video games that has been a trending in this decade! Complete this video game trivia identifying all the characters, weapons and items.

In this quiz app you wont find any video game before 2010 and its updated with the new uncoming releases of 2019.

Beat another players by answering as fast as possible all the questions and join the leaderboard with other 100 real-gamers.

Now you can show the world you are the best gamer ever!


♦ Are you an authentic Gamer? Check this features! ♦

• Discover more than 570 video games of this decade.
• Up to 19 categories: Main characters, weapons, logos, enemies, places, bosses...
• All the games are from this last years. Nothing retro.
• Global ranking with the Top100 gamers in the world.
• Unlockeable levels.
• Hint system if you get stuck at any level.
• There are few ads (Just one ad every 6 minutes)
• Share your achievements or ask your friends by Twitter, Facebook or any of your social networks!
• Enjoy it!



The main purpose of #MegaQuizGaming is to show the people the great variety of video games that surround us in a funny way. In #MegaQuizGaming, great titles are mixed with other independent titles, creating a list where players can distance themselves from their usual titles and discover new projects.

title: Geo Challenge - Geography Quiz
description:
Geo Challenge is a fun and challenging geography quiz game with beautiful graphics and animation to test your geography knowledge of the world. This exciting geography game comes with 4 mini-quiz to test your knowledge in 4 categories: country flags, country borders, major cities of the world and famous landmarks around the world. Complete all 4 categories in a single challenge. Each mini-quiz lasts for 60 seconds. Answer as fast and accurate as possible. Extra bonus and time are awarded for consecutive right answers.

Improve your world geography knowledge with this quiz game.  Whether you are a geography student, avid traveler or geography experts, you will sure enjoy this fun quiz game.

Use training mode to improve your geography knowledge in different areas . Beat your own score or sign in to Google Play to compete with your friends and the rest of the world!

4 mini-quiz:
Country flags - Test your knowledge of 219 country flags. Choose the right flag for the country
Country borders - Test your knowledge of 109 country borders. Choose the right country that matches the map
Major cities of the world - Test your knowledge of 152 major cities of the world. Pin them at the right location on the map
Famous landmarks around the world  - Test your knowledge of 107 famous landmarks around the work. Pin them at the right location on the map

Features:
1. Google Play Leaderboard and Achievements
2. Training - train in each mini-game. Training score will not be ranked.
3. Profile - challenge stats
4. In app purchase - remove ads
5. Settings - Sound, Music, Left/Right handed, Tap or Tap and point.

The landmarks/attractions images were obtained from Internet for educational purpose and are not intended to infringe any copyrights. They were chosen because of suitability and aesthetic reasons. If you own the copyrights to the images and want them to be removed from the game, kindly contact us. Thank you.

title: Read & Spell Game Fourth Grade
description:
Read and spell game app is a free app for fourth graders to learn spelling and master vocabulary. It covers more than 100 vocabulary words kids need to read by fourth grade. It helps them master comprehension, spelling, writing and usage of each words. 
Includes:
- Fill in the blank sentences
- Read sentences with focus on fourth grade vocabulary words
- Guess the word activities with voice overs.
- Proofreading practice for use with grade 4
- Features words from the Dolch Word List, a commonly recognized core of sight words.

How to play:
1. Select a level to play (Easy, Medium and Hard)
2. Tap the box to listen
3. Fill the blank.
4. Use hints (remove or reveal words)
5. Complete at least 5 questions to unlock new level.

title: FRIENDS Quiz
description:
The Friends TV show quiz that you can play with your own friends!

This app has over 300 questions with more to come in regular updates. You can pick a gamemode and a dificulty level. The levels of dificulty are easy, medium, hard and all questions. If you would like to submit your own question or contact us about a mistake please email us at contact@zapborg.tk.

There are four gamemodes:

1) Streak:
How many questions can you get correct in a row? The game will continue until you get one wrong. You can play by yourself or with up to four players. In multiplayer, each player will get out once they get a question wrong and the game will continue until all the players are out.

2) 10 Rounds:
As you'd expect, this gamemode has 10 rounds of questions where you try to get as many correct as possible. You can play by yourself or with up to four players.

3) Timed:
See how many questions you can get correct in a set amount of time. The default is a minute but you can set this yourself. You can play by yourself or with up to four players. In multiplayer, each player will answer one question before it's the next player's turn and the player's individual timer will go down as they answer this question. Once a player's timer reaches 0, that player is out. The game continues until all the players are out.

4) Who Said It?:
You are given quotes from the show and you have to say which character it was that said it. In singleplayer the game carries on until you get one wrong. You can also play with up to four players. In multiplayer when a player gets a quote wrong they are out and the game ends when all the players are out.

title: 20 Questions
description:
20 Questions is the world's favorite guessing game! You may remember playing 20 Questions in the car on family road trips. There's no need to wait for that road trip anymore. That's right--we are the first to bring this classic guessing game to your social network, so you can play it anywhere, anytime, with real people, in real time! It's like that game, Akinator, except that it's with real people!

The top player each week gets two FREE movie tickets from us. See 20questions.com/contest for more details.

NOTE: Please be advised that currently you will have to login via Facebook to play (we will not ever post to Facebook with your permission), but we are working on bringing in other login options soon. Thanks for your patience!

HOW TO PLAY
20 Questions is a turn-based game where a player (the Thinker) thinks of something and then gives a hint. Others (the Guessers) will ask questions and try to guess what the Thinker is thinking. If the Guessers get it right within 20 attempts, they win, otherwise, the Thinker wins. That's it--it's so simple that even grandma can join in the fun! 

SCORING
Guessers get 1 point for each question asked for which the answer is YES or SOMETIMES. The Guesser who makes the correct guess also gets an additional 20 bonus points, plus x bonus points where x is the number of remaining questions. The Thinker gets 1 point for each question asked for which the answer is NO. The Thinker also gets an additional 20 bonus points if the Guessers don't get it right within 20 attempts. So, a player (whether Guesser or Thinker) can score a maximum of 39 points on any given game.

Games have a powerful way of bringing family and friends together. Forty years ago this meant families joining together at game night to play Risk or Monopoly. In recent years, Words with Friends, Draw Something, Trivia Crack and others have created opportunities for bonding with friends and family. With 20 Questions, we have taken the world’s most widely recognized guessing game, and adapted it for play on the social platform. There have been versions of this game where you play with the computer as your opponent, but we are the first to bring this classic guessing game to your social network, where you can play with real people, in real time. 

20 Questions is intellectually simulating, highly addictive and engaging, and is a great workout for the growing youngster's brain. Start playing now and let's see how soon you can become a top ten guesser or thinker!

Play 20 Questions online at http://20questions.com
Follow us on Facebook: http://facebook.com/20questions
Follow us on Twitter: http://twitter.com/20questions
Email us at team@20questions.com

title: Questions In A Box
description:
The Questions In A Box app provides you with hundreds of great conversation starting questions using a fun and intuitive interface. Use these conversation starters at restaurants with friends, around the dinner table with family, or to get to know neighbors and co-workers.

Questions In A Box will also update with fresh new questions each time we push out an update to our server with no need to update the app itself. Questions In A Box makes it easier than ever to start meaningful conversations with whoever you come into contact with.

title: Disney Movies Quiz
description:
So you think you know everything? Well, then download Disney Movies Quiz now and test your knowledge! From the most famous facts, to the lesser-known information, we have it all in a quiz format! Test what you know and be surprised by the new details that you will learn with this game.

Trust us, we will test your knowledge about trivia with this awesome quiz! So, what are you waiting for? Download Disney Movies Quiz now! If you like it, don’t forget to rate it!♕ If you think you know it all and want to test your knowledge or you just want to have a game to pass the time, Disney Movies Quiz will be perfect for you! Try this fun quiz now and we promise that you will find some interesting new facts!

♕ You have up to 100 questions, divided in 10 levels from the easy to hard. Don’t jump to the conclusion that it’s going to be easy, you only have a maximum of 20 seconds to respond, so act fast. If you are unsure of the answers, you can use the hints that this game provides you.

How do you play our new trivia game, Disney Movies Quiz:• Select the unlocked level.
• The faster you answer the questions the more stars you will get! If you answer them correctly, of course!
• If you fail to answer at least 3 questions out of the 10, the game will end, but you can restart the level.
• Once you have completed a level, the next one will unlock. The levels will get harder and harder as you progress through the game.

Another fun thing you have is the statistics panel where you can see your progress in the game.

So go ahead! Download Disney Movies Quiz and start testing your knowledge!
If you have finished this fun quiz you can download another trivia topic or quiz game from the list presented in Disney Movies Quiz!

title: Ultimate Quiz for FRIENDS
description:
Ultimate Quiz for F.R.I.E.N.D.S. is a simple quiz game based on the highly popular TV sitcom FRIENDS.

Features of the game:

• Over 400 questions with more to be added in regular intervals.

• 3 game modes-

 1) Classic Quiz: In Classic mode you get questions related to the tv show. Time for each question will be 30 sec.The less time you take to answer the more score you will get. Wrong answer does not interrupt the game.

 2) Quotes Quiz: In Quotes quiz mode you have to identify which character said that line in the show. The less time you take to answer the more score you will get. Time for each question will be 30 sec. Wrong answer does not interrupt the game.

 3) The Lightning Round: It's just like Ross' version. You get 30 sec to answer maximum questions correctly.

• Featuring Leaderboards so you can compete against fans of the show from all over the world.

• You can submit your own questions to us and we will include unique ones in the next updates, we will also include your name in the credits sections if your question is included.

If you find any mistake in questions or if you have any suggestion to improve the game please send you response to indroidsoft@gmail.com . Any comments, remarks or suggestions to improve our program are welcome.

How to become a doctor with this learning app? Learn about the human body facts by answering a multiple choice test! You will see a human body picture for every interesting question and you need to tap the correct solution under it. This medical quiz & anatomy study app has questions concerning: anatomical terms, human organs and their functions and more! Human Anatomy And Physiology Quiz is not one of those boring medical games for nurses! Take a look at internal view of human body organs in this fun educational game! Play educational trivia games with up to 400 anatomy and physiology questions and answers!

🧠 If the answer is correct, it will be highlighted in green!

What's the longest bone of human skeleton? Learn the bones of the body or organs and parts of other systems! Revise basic Human Anatomy And Physiology Quiz and become advanced in medical knowledge! title: Bible Journey Trivia Game
description:
Bible Journey Trivia Game is a free and offline Bible trivia game that offers a unique Bible game experience, with most features requiring no internet!

It contains over 1200 carefully crafted questions from the whole Bible, which are aimed for helping the user learn the Bible in an entertaining way.

OFFLINE FEATURES
- Journey mode: a trivia mode that starts from the first book of the Bible and unlocks other books as you progress! You can play the Old Testament and New Testament at the same time. Contains over 1200 questions. With the new community feature we keep adding new questions from the list of suggested questions by the community!

- Quiz mode: in 3 different quiz types answer multiple-choice questions randomly asked from the whole Bible. Contains over 400 questions.

- All answers of the questions are referenced to Bible verses for your study and learning.

- Read the whole King James Version in English.

- Favorites and notes: save verses into your favorites list, and write down notes for them and read them later.

- Search within the Bible, your favorite verses and your notes

ONLINE FEATURES
- Create a user or sign in with your Google account, and synchronize your Bible Journey Trivia Game data across multiple devices.

- Journey statistics: compare your journey progress with others and make your way up to the top as you study the Bible.

COMING SOON
- KJV commentary by Matthew Henry

title: Namestate - States and Capitals Quiz
description:
Easily learn all 50 US states and capitals in this new and exciting game! Study, flip through flashcards, or quiz yourself on the states you need to master for your upcoming test without wasting time on all the other states.

****Study****
☀ Select which states you want to study
☀ Decide if you want just an image of the state or a map of the US with the state highlighted
☀ See the state abbreviation, capital, image, and date it joined the union

****Flashcards****
☀ Change the type of information displayed on each side of the card (name, capital, flag, image)
☀ Decide what states are included in the flashcards
☀ Swipe up and down to flip the card over

****Quiz****
☀ Multiple choice and spelling quiz options
☀ Full list of wrong and correct answers to review afterward
☀ Select the number of questions and type of questions to be quizzed

Fully customize the way you use this app by selecting if you only want to see the state being studied, the map of the United States of America with the state colored in, or a map with nearby states labeled.

title: Cuanto Sabes de Primaria
description:
¡Pon a prueba tus conocimientos, demuestra cuanto sabes de primaria!
¿Te crees capaz de responder PREGUNTAS de todo lo que aprendiste en el Colegio?
En esta TRIVIA vas a resolver problemas de Matemáticas y Lógica, responder preguntas de Geografía, Historia, Idioma Español, APRENDER Inglés y mucho más!!

La Trivia de Primaria comienza con preguntas fáciles que ayudarán a los niños a mejorar sus calificaciones de Primer grado y harán recordar a los más grandes sus primeros pasos en el Colegio. A medida que vayas pasando de nivel, las preguntas serán más difíciles, ¡pero con practica todos podrán responderlas!

Jugar Cuanto Sabes de Primaria es muy fácil! 1 pregunta y 4 respuestas, solo una de las respuestas es la correcta!

Con cada respuesta correcta el juego te dará puntos y monedas. Los jugadores que más puntos tengan ocuparan los primeros puestos en el Ranking de Cuanto Sabes de Primaria! Con las Monedas podrás comprar ayudas para el juego en la Tienda.

Cuando respondas varias preguntas sin cometer ni un solo error, ganaras increíbles BONUS que aumentarán tu puntaje!

¿Cómo Canjeo Ayudas?

Para canjear las ayudas deberás entrar en la Tienda y elegir entre estas 3 opciones:

- Pistas (te guiarán para llegar a la respuesta correcta)
- 50/50 (te ahorra la mitad del trabajo, desaparece 2 de las respuestas)
- Comodín (Pasas a la próxima pregunta y ganas los puntos)

¡MUY IMPORTANTE! ¡El juego Cuanto Sabes de Primaria no tiene fin! Las preguntas se actualizan automáticamente todos los días y nunca se terminan!

¡Ya es hora de empezar a aprender jugando! Recuerda, para aprobar cada nivel debes conseguir un 70% de preguntas correctas! ¿Podrás conseguirlo?

Descarga la mejor Trivia para Aprender Primaria, aumenta tus conocimientos e inteligencia jugando!

title: IconMania: Movie & Icon Quiz

IconMania: Movie & Icon Quiz is a Pictionary game where you have to guess the pop icons. 
There will be logos and icons of movies, celebrities, brands, countries, cool people, and anything you can think of. You just have to guess the pic to solve then pop icon puzzle. Some of them are easy and some are quite challenging, but this is definitely a very cute game.  This icon mania is truly the best casual game and the most iconic quiz you can find! 
If you love pictionary and guess the pic games, you will love our icomania game! Now you can play guess the icon from your Android device. We handcrafted some of the most awesome logos and icons that you have to guess. We have created over 1000 logos and icons so you will have a lot of excitement and fun playing  this logo quiz cute game.  The pictures will vary. Sometimes you will find logo & movie icons. Sometimes they’re logos of cool people or brands. These people can be movie stars, celebrities, famous actors, or famous artists. We created this mix between icomania & movie game just for an icon mania like you. We challenge you to download our game and test your knowledge in this awesome iconic quiz! 

TOP FEATURES OF ICONMANIA: MOVIE & ICON QUIZ :
- Play this fun and exciting icomania game on your Android device for FREE.
- Addictive and interesting pictionary casual game that will test your general knowledge to the limit.  
- Over 1000 handcrafted logos and icons that will give plenty of challenges.
- Colorful and attractive game design that you will love immediately.

title: HVAC Quiz
description:
HVAC stands for Heating, Ventilation, and Air Conditioning. HVAC systems give comfort environment condition to you. No one can deny the importance of HVAC in our lives.it makes possible to live in any climatic condition.

In terms of technology, the key elements that provide the fundamentals of heat and fresh air are the systems for heating, ventilation and air conditioning.

This app will cover all the major areas of Air Conditioning, from basic knowledge to advance. Maintenance, Operation and designing in coming versions. 

Some key features of HVAC Quiz:
                 * There are various levels, from easy to difficult
                 * Question will be repeated in the session till you give the right answer.
                 * Each level have different target score, lower the level lower the target.
                 * There are three chances to miss the right answer to achieve your target score.
                 * If you could not achieved your target after losing three chances your score will become zero.
                 * You can keep on trying till you achieve your target and reach to the next level.

There are some Questions as below:

Q.
One BTU is the amount of heat required to raise the temperature of:

Option -1 one pound of water one-degree Fahrenheit
Option -2 one gallon of water one-degree Fahrenheit
Option -3 one pound of ice one-degree Fahrenheit.
Option -4 one gallon of water eight degrees Fahrenheit.


Q.
An over-sized heating and cooling system can cause the following?

Option -1 Operating cost and relative humidity in the structure will decrease significantly.
Option -2 Moisture damage to a furnace heat exchanger and inadequate humidity removal during cooling cycles.
Option -3 The structure will develop low humidity levels in the cooling season and high humidity in the winter.
Option -4 Equipment will last longer and require less energy to operate due to the shorter run time.

Q.
Water is considered a refrigerant. What is its name?

Option -1 R-401
Option -2 R-718
Option -3 R-170
Option -4 R-1270

Q.
The essential parameters to estimate cooling load from air side across an air handling

Option -1 Flow rate
Option -2 Dry bulb temperature
Option -3 RH% or wet bulb temperature
Option -4 All of the above

Q.Metering device:
Option -1 changes as high pressure vapor to high pressure liquid
Option -2 changes a low pressure vapor to a low pressure liquid
Option -3 changes a high pressure liquid to low pressure liquid
Option -4 changes low pressure vapor to high pressure vapor

Q.
Which of the following statement is wrong?

Option -1 The heat transfer in liquid and gases takes place according to convection.
Option -2 The amount of heat flow through a body is dependent upon the material of the body.
Option -3 The thermal conductivity of solid metals increases with rise in temperature.
Option -4 Logarithmic mean temperature difference is not equal to the arithmetic mean temperature difference.

Q.
Which of the following statement is correct?

Option -1 The human body can lose heat even if its temperature is less than the atmospheric temperature.
Option -2 The increase in air movement increases the evaporation from the human body.
Option -3 The warm air increases the rate of radiation of heat from the human body.
Option -4 both (1 and 2)




Note: If you have your own questions and answers, we can add in this quiz to the benefits of others.

title: Play-along Jeopardy
description: You can assess your Jeopardy knowledge playing this game.  Play honestly to get an honest assessment.  Start playing this game while watching Jeopardy on TV.  You can become the fourth contestant.  Select the amount the TV contestant chooses.  If you answer before any contestant do and your answer is right, select the "Right" button.  Select the "Wrong" button for a wrong answer. If you selected a bid amount but did not want to answer, select "Cancel" button. You can also press "True Daily Double" when you want to make it one, along with the contestant.  The "Double" button will setup the game for double jeopardy segment.  You can also type in the amount into the amount field, intended for final Jeopardy.
descriptionHTML: You can assess your Jeopardy knowledge playing this game.  Play honestly to get an honest assessment.  Start playing this game while watching Jeopardy on TV. You can also press "True Daily Double" when you want to make it one, along with the contestant.  The "Double" button will setup the game for double jeopardy segment.  You can also type in the amount into the amount field, intended for final Jeopardy.
summary: Assess your Jeopardy Knowledge
recentChanges:
This is a game to assess your Jeopardy knowledge. Play honestly for an honest assessment.
Start game while watching Jeopardy on your TV. You will be the fourth contestant in the game. As the players bid an amount for a question, you select the same amount. If you answer right before other contestants, select the "Right" button. The bid amount will be added to your chest. If your answer is wrong, the bid amount would be deducted. You may enter an arbitrary amount for the final Jeopardy

title: TriviAlist 2: Offline Trivia Quiz Game
description:
TriviAlist 2 is the sequel to TriviAlist, a trivia quiz game about the biggest, the best, the most famous and the most infamous. It’s a game all about the ‘A - list’ of life. Can you SORT, MATCH and SELECT all the lists we throw at you? 
Do you know who did and did not appear in the Harry Potter movies? 
How about sorting your favorite songs in the order they came out?
Can you match the invention to the inventor?
It's a trivia quiz game like no other. 

TriviAlist 2 is free to play!
TriviAlist 2 does not require a connection to play! You can play offline / with no wifi connection—it's not a problem!
TriviAlist 2 is educational! Get tested on a wide variety of subjects, including movies, music, celebrities, art, history, science, sport, cooking, nature, geography, gaming, and business.
TriviAlist 2 is suitable for all ages to play, adults and kids alike!

It’s totally free to play, however some game features can also be purchased for real money. If you don't want this optional feature, please disable in-app purchases in your device's settings. 
If you have any problems or would like to make any suggestions, you can reach us at gamesupport@dctmedia.co.uk or find us on Facebook at https://www.facebook.com/TriviAlist-1906488056299144/

title: Quiz for SpongeBob SquarePants
description:
Quiz for SpongeBob SquarePants is a game in which you have to answer questions, based on the animated series SpongeBob SquarePants, correctly. We tried to make the questions as diverse and interesting as possible, so it will not be a tedious guessing, but a real adventure. You will be able to remember such characters as SpongeBob, Mr. Krabs, Sandy, Patrick and others, as well as to learn a lot about this animated series. 
 
The principle of the game is quite simple: You receive a question related to the SpongeBob SquarePants cartoon, and you need to answer it. If you can not answer it correctly, you can use 3 types of tips: remove extra letters, open the letter, open the whole word. 
 
The benefits of the game: 
Quality issues 
Interesting gameplay 
Convenient and beautiful interface 
Questions of different complexity 
You can play in the company 
 
If you have any questions or you find a mistake — please contact us. You can send us an email or leave a feedback with a question, with a description of the problem or just with a wish. We will contact you. 
You can also play our other quizzes and tests on anime, games, cartoons, TV series, etc.

title: Riddle Me That - Guess Riddle
description:
Riddle Me That! Do you like guessing riddles and playing riddle quiz game? Can you guess these riddles? 

Riddle of the day:
What do you call a dog that sweats so much?
What falls but never breaks?

Try this "Riddle Me That!" game! It's the best riddle quiz game, and It's free! 
For every riddle, you will have 12 or 14 mixed letters for candidate, and you will be shown the number of letters for answers. These are already the hints for you, so it's easier than traditional riddles.
There will be lots of levels for you to unlock if you answer enough riddles, so you can guess futher riddles without having to guess the current one like other riddle games.

Go Go Go! So now let's begin this riddle game - Riddle Me That! Riddle me this, riddle me that, Riddle Me Brains!

The answers of two questions: hotdog and night.

Don't try to search the riddles and answers online, since it will reduce the fun!

title: Guess BTS Song Emojis
description:
Guess the Bts song by trying to figure out what the emojis stand for. Some may be hard and some not so hard. The pictures will help you not all so don't be fooled.

Let's Start The Game. Have Fun And Good Luck :) 
Rate it and share it if you like it!

Complete all levels, do not give up, prove that you are a true BTS fan.


Bangtan Boys (Hangul: 방탄소년단; RR: Bangtan Sonyeondan), also known as BTS, is a seven-member South Korean boy group formed by Big Hit Entertainment. The name of the band, Bangtan Sonyeondan, is a combination of "방탄" which means bulletproof and "소년단" which means boy scouts. They debuted on June 13, 2013 with the song "No More Dream" from their first album, 2 Cool 4 Skool.

BTS has won several "New Artist of the Year" awards, including those at the 2013 MelOn Music Awards and Golden Disk Awards, and the 2014 Seoul Music Awards. A year after their debut, they received major bonsang awards for Dark & Wild and The Most Beautiful Moment In Life, Part 1.

BTS's Members:
Rap Monster (Kim Namjoon; 김남준) – Leader, Rapper
Jin (Kim Seokjin; 김석진) – Vocalist
Suga (Min Yoongi; 민윤기) – Rapper
J-Hope (Jung Hoseok; 정호석) – Rapper, Dancer
Jimin (Park Jimin; 박지민) – Vocalist, Dancer
V (Kim Taehyung; 김태형) – Vocalist
Jungkook (Jeon Jeongguk; 전정국) – Vocalist, Rapper, Dancer

title: Quiz your English
description:
Quiz Your English is a fun new way to practise, improve, and test your English by competing against learners from all around the world. Learn English grammar with friends, discover new English words, and test yourself in a truly global environment. 

Go head-to-head with your language skills by challenging other players and friends to English games. Invite friends to play via Facebook, or search for an opponent by name. Face off against international rivals in real time and battle it out in English quiz competitions to see who can score the best – take on a fun general English vocabulary exercise or English grammar test and smash your opponents! Covering a broad range of topics, experience online language learning like never before! The most enjoyable (and nail-biting!) way to take on English vocabulary exercises, Quiz Your English is the brand new way to enjoy learning your favourite language. Whether you need help on your vocabulary for work, education, travelling, or leisure, our app has it covered – the perfect choice for students preparing for the Cambridge English exams.

Players can check their stats to see where they went wrong in their English grammar test or vocabulary games, and get (friendly!) revenge with a quick rematch. Earn points to move up the leaderboards and gain coins that can be traded for in-game power ups. See where you stand both globally and nationally, and pit your wits against learners across the world. In-app purchases unlock new content for players, helping them to reach their next level of learning English grammar. Players can build their profiles and look back over their history of completed English games to see how much they’ve improved.

Using official content from Cambridge English – the producers of the IELTS test – you can practise for your Cambridge Certificate exams right on your phone. Whether studying for a FCE exam or preparing for your PET exam, enjoy effective, fun, competitive online language learning with our app. Aimed at intermediate B2 English level students, and learners needing B1 English test practice, our English quiz will help you find fellow learners and make your skills grow! 

Quiz Your English is one of the most enjoyable ways to build your vocabulary of English words, and learn English grammar, all while making friends with other genuine language learners around the world. Local language versions are available for Mexico, Brazil, and Spain.

title: THIS IS… Your World
description:
What do you know about your world? 
‘THIS IS… Your World’ is a new quiz game guaranteed to reveal surprising truths about the planet you live on.
Collect and compare over 200 cards from all corners of the Earth, including all 50 US States. 

If you can answer these, then try the harder challenges in the game!
What country is the biggest? Canada or Russia?
Who has the bigger economy? California or Italy? 
Which has the highest mountain? The United States or Australia?
Where is the homicide rate higher? Alaska or Mexico?
Who has the longer life expectancy? France or China?
Which has the largest population? Japan or the United Kingdom?

descriptionHTML:
What do you know about your world?
‘THIS IS… Your World’ is a new quiz game guaranteed to reveal surprising truths about the planet you live on.
Collect and compare over 200 cards from all corners of the Earth, including all 50 US States.

If you can answer these, then try the harder challenges in the game!
What country is the biggest? Canada or Russia?
Who has the bigger economy? California or Italy?
Which has the highest mountain? The United States or Australia?
Where is the homicide rate higher? Alaska or Mexico?
Who has the longer life expectancy? France or China?
Which has the largest population? Japan or the United Kingdom?

Win the game by correctly placing your cards into a list of countries.
Play alone, play offline, play against friends.
‘THIS IS… Your World’ is super educational.

- THIS IS… Military Machines: All about the planes, tanks and ships of warfare through the ages.

- THIS IS… Amazing Cities: All about the great cities of the world.

title: Deal The Big Deal
description:
Hosted by VMOGA, Published by VGDN Publisher.

"Deal The Big Deal" is an exhilarating hit game show where contestants play and deal for a top prize of $1 million in a high-energy contest of nerves, instincts and raw intuition.

Each night, the game of odds and chance unfolds when a contestant is confronted with 25 sealed briefcases full of varying amounts of cash – ranging from a measly penny to $1 million. Without knowing the amount in each briefcase, the contestant picks one – his to keep if he chooses – until its unsealing at game's end.

The risk element kicks in when the player must then instinctively eliminate the remaining 24 cases – which are opened and the amount of cash inside revealed. The pressure mounts as in each round, after a pre-determined number of cases are opened, the participant is tempted by a mysterious entity known only as "the Banker" to accept an offer of cash in exchange for what might be contained in the contestant's chosen briefcase – prompting Mandel to ask the all-important question – Deal or No? You must think carefully to give the right answer.

As each case is opened, the likelihood of the player having a valuable cash amount in his or her own case decreases or increases. Viewers will see if, truly, fortune favors the bold. The contestant knows that as long as the larger cash prizes haven't been opened, the Banker's deals will only get higher. And if the conflicted contestant accidentally opens a case with a bigger cash value – the Banker's offer could suddenly evaporate.

If you see anything need to improve to make game more fun. Please give us your comments.
VGDN committed to bringing the good game for Google Play.

Do not be frustrated if your score is low.

title: How much do you know me? 2
description:
This game calculates how much you and your friend or couple know each other after answering a series of questions. First you have to answer personal questions that will be different depending on who you're playing with. Then you must let the other person with whom you play answer the same questions, trying to get their answers match yours. At the end of the game you will get a total score set by the number of coincidences in your responses. Also, the application will give another score about the relationship between the two of you.




How much do you know me? 2  - Game Features

🔹 Questions
🔹 Friends
🔹 Couples
🔹 Love
🔹 Challenge
🔹 Multiplayer
🔹 Test

💑👫👬👭

title: Think
description:
A minimalistic, beautifully designed visual puzzle game designed for the Pure Android experience.

With over 360 puzzles spread over 30 chapters, this game is sure to pull you in.
Best played with friends and family together. You will rediscover the delight and joy in solving puzzles together - huddled around a small screen for hours together with mesmerizing music.

In the beginning, human beings communicated only using symbols.
Language complicated things. Suddenly, there were many words to describe the same idea.

Think attempts to slowly teach the player to think visually and uses these learnings to construct more complicated ideas further into the game. Can you take a look at a bunch of images and figure out what ideas we are trying to communicate?

The game uses a smart, contextually aware hint system and AI which will guide you to the correct answer - instead of just opening out few letters on the keyboard as most other games do. You will find yourself having delightful conversations with the game and trying out various combinations - just to elicit a response from the AI.

To complement the beautiful visuals, the game features music by award winning composer Jim Guthrie (Indie Game the Movie and Sword & Sorcery).

With over 360 puzzles spread over 30 chapters, this game is sure to pull you in.
Best played with friends and family together. You will rediscover the delight and joy in solving puzzles together - huddled around a small screen for hours together.

A product of love from the proud stables of June Software Inc.

title: Logo Brand Color By Number - Pixel Art
description:
Conscious or not, our lives are surrounded by various logos, from logos of food, drinks, automotive, music, industry, sports and others.

Of the many brand logos, how many do you remember ??

For those of you who like coloring, have you ever colored various logos ??

If you haven't, it's time to play the Brand Logo Color By Number - Pixel Art !!

Brand Logo Color By Number - Pixel Art is a coloring game for various kinds of logos that exist throughout the world.

HOW TO PLAY Logo Brand Color By Number - Pixel Art
> Choose a picture that you like.
> Zoom in until the number appears.
> Color numbers according to the color you choose.

EXCELLENCE OF THIS GAME
> You can share the coloring results to your friends.
> There are many logo pictures.
> You can create your own pixel image from your mobile gallery.

Let 's coloring, have fun!

title: Wellwrite! 📖 Spelling test
description:
Take an English grammar tests in the form of a word game for free. Orthography quiz will help to remember spelling rules of dictionary words and to avoid misspelled glossary.



The dictation has collected the most interesting and complex questions:
Each round consists of 20 questions. There appear 4 ways of spelling of a tricky word.
You have to choose which one is correct.
At the end of each round you will see what your knowledge is worth: from an A to F.


APPLICATION FUNCTIONS

✔️ Levels of difficulty.
5 difficulty levels (Apprentice, Student, Professor ect.) from the lightest tasks to the complex level.
This quiz is for all levels of preparation: it is smart game for adults and for students.

✔️ Trivia games for two players on one device
A good opportunity to compete with friends in the word games that don’t need wifi. And find out who has IQ above

✔️ Work on mistakes and spell check
Check words only from those questions in which the user made spelling mistakes.
At the end of each round, you can see the list of tasks in which the mistake was made, and the correct words’ spelling.


✔️ Achievements
To make using of spelling test of the English language an interesting activity, the player has the ability to track the statistics of his results with the help of achievements 


✔️ Built-in widget
Users can download mind games for free to place on their home screen a widget on which throughout the day they will see lexicon from the quizzes.


✔️ Application Settings
You can change the font of brain test, mute the sound and configure other features.


We will broaden your English vocabulary, learning and writing skills!
The spelling quiz game creators used authorized dictionaries of English language. 

Wellwrite! – Write well!
("Wellwrite!" © AllyTeam.)

title: Flowers - Botanical Quiz about Beautiful Plants
description:
Guess the 110 most beautiful flowers! There are photos of garden plants and forest wildflowers, blooming tulips and exotic rafflesia, red roses and bright yellow sunflowers.

Choose the game mode you like and identify flowers on the pictures:
1) Two spelling quizzes: a) easy - with growing difficulty - and b) hard - with questions in a random order. Determine the flower on the picture.
2) Multiple-choice questions (with 4 or 6 answer options). It’s important to remember that you have only 3 lives.
3) Time game (give as many answers as you can in 1 minute) - you should give more than 25 correct answers to get a star.
Two learning tools:
* Flashcards (common and Latin names).
* Table of all flowers in the app.

The app is translated into 13 languages, including English, French, Spanish and many others. So you can learn the names of the flowers in foreign languages.

Is it a daffodil or a crocus? It’s like a small botanical garden in your app - play the game and improve your knowledge of botany! Compete in recognition of plants!

title: Name That Game - NES
description:
Think you know Nintendo games, I mean really know them? Test your skills and guess the title of the game by looking at a screenshot of your favorite 8 bit, finger numbing, one more life, up all night classic retro NES games. 

What was that game? Metroid, Super Mario, MegaMan?

100+ levels with more added every week!

Ask your friends for help maybe they remember some game you don't!

Hints!

Are you stuck on a hard picture? Do not fear, hints are here to save the day!

Expose A Letter - Using this hint will reveal a random letter in the puzzle. Use this hint when you need an extra nudge to guess the image on a hard question! 

Remove The Letters - This hint removes all letters from the board which are NOT USED in the puzzle game. This hint can be very helpful on shorter puzzles. Use it wisely! 

Solve It! - This hint will completely solve the word question for you! Use it if you're totally stumped!

We hope you enjoy the game!

Expose A Letter - Using this hint will reveal a random letter in the puzzle. Use this hint when you need an extra nudge to guess the image on a hard question!

Remove The Letters - This hint removes all letters from the board which are NOT USED in the puzzle game. This hint can be very helpful on shorter puzzles. Use it wisely!

Solve It! - This hint will completely solve the word question for you! Use it if you're totally stumped!

We hope you enjoy the game!
summary: Think you know NES games? 100+ levels, how far can you make it?
recentChanges: Now over 160 levels of retro goodness.

title: IQ Test - The Intelligence Quiz
description:
- IQ Test completely in English and free to play (more languages coming soon)
- WIth Multiplayer Party Mode and quiz elements
- Scientifically developed by students of the University of Rostock (Germany)
- With excercise mode: Play all quiz tasks with solutions and explanations again
- Compare your result with friends
- Many more great functions for the IQ Test are still planned

---------------------------------------------------------------
Why should you take part of this IQ Test?
---------------------------------------------------------------

Influenced by WAIS-IV (Wechsler Intelligence Test for Adults) and research by students of the University of Rostock, the IQ Test includes the following tasks:

- Perceptive reasoning
- Processing speed
- working memory
- speech understanding
- Number understanding

These categories are queried in the IQ Test in various categories, including sample groups, dice test, remember pictures, number series, matrix test, estimate, order numbers and more!

Start your IQ Test now and compare with your friends! The first quiz has around 100 tasks, so take some time and start your IQ Test today! The test is free, but you can get extra features with our statistics or explanations package.

---------------------------------------------------------------
What is an IQ Test?
---------------------------------------------------------------

An IQ test is used to show how "intelligent" you are in relation to other people. But what is intelligence? This is not a defined term and so intelligence is just what an IQ test measures. Therefore, different IQ tests can not be compared, just the same test, and it simply tells you if you have solved the tasks better (over IQ 100) or worse (under IQ 100) than the average. So do not take the IQ that seriously, just test how you cut off compared to others!

title: 3rd Grade Spelling Games
description:
Fun way to learn english vocabulary and practise to spell the words
Free play : Spelling Words Game for 3rd Grade

How to play?
1. See the picture
2. Try to describe it to 1 word
3. Choose the right answer
4. Need help? Ask your friend in Facebook (in the wrong answer page)
5. Listen to the vocabulary after answering the correct word
6. Try to spell it, repeat the voice
7. Don't try to crack this game. haha..

title: Emoji Quiz. Scratch and guess trivia games
description:
This is a brand new emoji quiz and the most fun ever. 
Very simple to use, scratch your smartphone screen to find out what is de logo behind, you can guess movies, places, cities, monuments, flags, jokes, things. Everything! You are gonna love it.

Find the emoji and click your answer, unlimited fun, 100 's of emoji logo icons.

Do you like smilies? This is your game also.

In this emoji game you have to have emojination try to guess the emoji as fast as you can. Match the emoji with the answers you have available, you have a lot of topics as cars, pop, celebrities, brands, football teams, computers, pop singers, places, cities and more! This game is suitable for adult and young people, tons of fun! 

This game is ok for all the family, it is fun for children, parents and grandparents. Anyone can play it. Just guess the picture.

Challenge yourself, challenge your friends too.

You can use 3 Power-Ups to make the game easier and more fun:
★★ Freezer time: Freeze the time 5 seconds every time you use it.
★★ Scratch Again: Use it to scratch the screen again.
★★ Remove three answers: Click it and three wrong answers will disappear.

Whether you’re on the toilet, in the street, at home, or in the office toilets, you can join the fun. 
Whether you’re playing with friends or alone, it’s going to be difficult to stop once you start the game. Finding the correct answer is really fun!
Kids and family friendly game tests your logic and reasoning skills to solve this simple (and hard!) Emoji quiz puzzles! 
What is it that these emoticons are describing on your smartphone screen?! 

Can you guess them all?

title: Henry Captain Danger Quiz
description:
In this unofficial Henry Captain Danger game you will see drawings of all the characters of the famous television series and you will have to write their names. Every time you hit, you'll get coins as a reward.

If you do not recognize a character you can use the coins to ask for hints or share the drawing through social networks with your friends.

In Henry Captain Danger you can have fun with your favorite superhero: Kid danger.

CHARACTERISTICS:

- The game has more than 40 levels, with drawings of characters like: Henry (Kid Danger), Captain Man, Charlotte, Jaspers, etc.

- The names of the characters are in English.

- As new characters come out the Henry Captain Danger series will be updated.

Download the game and have fun demonstrating that you are the best fan, surpassing all levels.

description:
❤️🎬 Most Loved by Movie Fanatics, Guess the Movie Quiz Trivia and Updates App on Playstore. Thank you!!! 💕🌟

Call yourself a movie buff? Think you can beat ‘em all? Presenting 🎬 Spotflik: a fun, free, fantastic movie trivia quiz game for all who love the magic of cinema, 😍📽️and can’t get enough of their favourite films!

Download and find how much of a "Movie Buff" you are
Compete with movie freaks like us around the world. Find out where you stand. Try and identify the movie from a photo, or a movie quote. Earn a place on the global leaderboard.

Learn trivia and fun facts your favourite films
Spotflik has the biggest collection of all the movie fun facts and behind the scenes updates. Everything is created by movie lovers for movie lovers. We have everything about your favourite films. All the new movies, all the cult movies, and all the classics.

Stay updated with latest movie trailers and industry movie news
There no need to go looking for new movie trailer. We keep track of latest trailers coming out for our users. We also keep users updated on whats happing in the industry and behind the scenes on upcoming movies.

We understand time is precious for everyone. We have movies to watch after all. 😜

title: Guess The Movie Quiz And Tv Show
description:
Can you guess the movie and  answer TV show questions?  Are you a tv addict who is passionate about movie and tv trivia? Challenge yourself with question games & TV show quiz! Answer movie trivia questions about top rated British or American sitcoms by selecting one answer in multiple choice questions with Guess The Movie Quiz And Tv Show Family games - fun games for family game night! The tasks is to guess who the character is or check trivia knowledge such as tv series quotes! How well do you know favorite tv shows? What were the best television series in the last decade? Try guessing pictures that are all about fantasy or sci fi! Catch up on latest news about celebrities with actors quiz & movie director games! Guess the superhero quiz and beat everyone!

✅ Interactive, cool and fun trivia!
✅ Games to play with friends
🎥 Comedy quiz/ Sitcom quiz/ Sci Fi quiz 
🎥 General Knowledge Quiz
🎥 Movie quotes trivia
🎥 TV quiz show games
🎥 Fun Facts - Guess The Movie Quiz And Tv Show

✅ Who needs practical, everyday knowledge? It's better to boost ego by testing pop culture general knowledge! Compete on the leaderboard by answering comedy questions & cool stuff! 
Outsmart your friends by answering correctly - guess the famous actors or actresses or take the how well do you know me quiz!
👆 👊 👋 👌 👍 👏 👐 

✅ Down for random fun while acquiring interesting things? This movie trivia quiz is a brainteaser and boredom buster all in one! Check your nerdy skills against useless knowledge! Let this movie character guessing game be a television guide!

Can you recognize all scenes, quotes and moments from favorite movies? Fighting scenes, supernatural or romantic close-ups, vampire tv shows and anime cartoon series. Do you know it all? Do you remember classic tv trivia? Let's find out with the best time passer! Try to win in Guess The Movie Quiz And Tv Show! Top 10 of everything 2018 - television trivia for best tv shows awaits! Have fun as you learn more about interesting topics!

🎬 🎭 Features of Guess The Movie Quiz And Tv Show:
🎥 Helpful hints- remove 2 incorrect answers! Take a hint but don't let the wheel decide! 
🎥 POWER-UPS & PROPS to increase fun
🎥 Compete and play with friends
🎥 Can you beat time in easy quiz games? Be as quick as possible!
🎥 It's easy to play and become a professional character guesser!

✅ Enjoy a CLASSIC GAMEPLAY of Guess The Movie Quiz And Tv Show during toilet time, or while waiting! Spend quality time with fun quizzes instead of drinking games!

How many nominees has your favorite sitcom? What teen drama has won the most awards? Don't write fan fiction, start the season countdown of popular TV shows with entertainment quiz! Get informed! If you had enough of sitcom binge watching, stop wondering what to watch! Entertain yourself with a game that you can play with your friends! As a television shows or TV series addict, you must have a great database storage in your mind about comedy sitcoms or soap operas! Use your hobby and choose the correct answer game! Play guess the tv show picture quiz insted of personality tests!

Play top tv series games about trending tv shows! The knowledge of fun trivia facts! title: Millionaire Quiz Game FREE
description:
Do you want to be a millionaire? let's play this educational game. This game is an adaptation of the program tv game show. Answer all questions correctly and get 1 Billion. Free Game Millionaire Quiz is not only entertaining but also educational. The level of difficulty about that in this game is already sorted, so players will feel continuously challenged to solve the problems that exist. In the game, you have to answer correctly all 15 questions with three options included assistance;

1. Fifty-Fifty (remove two wrong answer choices)
2. Phone Friend (telephone friends for answers)
3. Ask the Audience (ask the audience to answer)

You can also press the "Pass" to finish the game and get a score that has been obtained. There is an online ranking features / "Leaderboard" in this game, so you can duel brain by looking at your highest ranking along with your friends.

** Features Millionaire game ** 
- Free 100%
- Visually attractive
- The sound effects are lively
- There are many questions and help
- Ranking online / leaderboard

** Language options ** 
- English
- Indonesian
- Deutsch (German)
- French (France)

title: Quizmaster & Anatomy
description:
This trivia game has many questions that test your knowledge of Anatomy. As you’re playing, you can race yourself to get a time bonus, or even play with friends to compare achievements, or try to get on the Leaderboard! 

When start a new game, you can pick the difficulty level before you begin. Do you want a little practice when you’re first getting started? Try out the quizzes in easy mode. If you feel pretty confident, then move on to medium mode. And once you’re ready for advanced trivia, select hard mode for a challenge! And don’t worry, you can select another mode next time. 

Make sure you’re ready to play when you push the Start Game button, because the timer begins immediately. For each question, you’ll see four options, and sometimes there is also a photo to help out with the question. Make sure you read each question so you aren’t tricked when the answers include similar sounding words. Remember to act fast to select the right answer since you only get once chance. This is a fast-paced game! 

When your answer is right, it will be highlighted in green, and you’ll earn a star. When your answer is wrong, it will have a red highlight and you’ll be shown the right answer too. Click Next to move on to the next question until you’ve gotten to the end of the quiz. If you’d rather have the questions go to the next question after answering, select this on the Settings page before you start your next quiz. This may boost your chances of getting a time bonus too.

While you’re playing, you’ll see three magic buttons that allow you to reduce the number of answers, allow two answer tries for one question, or extend the time. These really help if you’re in a crunch and need a little extra time or can’t decide between the options. If you want some, then keep playing to earn crowns and spend them in the shop for more magic buttons. You can also purchase more crowns, or even pay to remove all advertisements. 

At the end, you’ll see all your stats for how you did that round. How many stars and crowns do you have? How many answers were correct? Did you get a success or time bonus? Start a new game, or you can review the questions and answers again by selecting Results Details, or by going to the Quiz History page from the main menu. You’ll see all the questions and answers, plus how fast you completed each quiz. 

And don’t forget to check out your Achievements as your status improves over time. When your friends play, you can compare your results and see the best player for each quiz. Didn’t win this week? That’s okay, keep playing and check the Leaderboard again to see if you’re the latest winner. And don’t forget to check out the other trivia available under More Quizzes:  Pop Music Quiz, Classical Music Quiz, Rock Quiz, and Spelling Quiz.

description:
Are you a big fan of The 100?
Do you know all the characters?

Take this fun quiz, you have several reasons to do it:

▪️ + 30 levels

▪️ Earn coins and buy advice.

The 100 (pronounced The Hundred) is an American post-apocalyptic science fiction drama television series.

The series follows a group of post-apocalyptic survivors, chiefly a group of adolescents. They are among the first people from a space habitat, "The Ark", to return to Earth after a devastating nuclear apocalypse.

title: Science Trivia Wheel
description:
How high is you science IQ?  

Compete with yourself or with members of the Science Trivia Wheel Community and have fun learning the science that helped build the technical world we live in.  

Science Trivia Wheel is a science quiz game suited for  all levels of players.  Loaded with over 600 carefully crafted  science and math questions and beautiful scientific pictures, this quiz game will educate and keep you entertained for hours without repeating a question.  Play leisurely against yourself or compete with your friends and members of the Science Trivia Wheel community.  The best players dominate our Leader Board and earn Nobel Prizes in the following categories:


●   Earth Sciences

●   Space and Astronomy

●   Exploration, Discovery and Invention

●   The Physical Sciences - Chemistry and Physics

●   Computational Sciences - Computers and Mathematics (Yes, we know there is no Nobel Prize for Mathematics, so we made one).

●   Life Sciences / Biology / Zoology / Medical Science

Who knows?  You may even achieve our highest rank of Nobel Laureate and walk away with several Nobel Prizes!  Sorry, the 1 million dollars that goes along with the prize is not available in order to comply with Google game policies.

description:
Guess the name of the most popular songs, recognized and with better trap and rap lyrics. Show all your knowledge about the trap songs as well as the artists and their songs.

This game contains more than 50 levels with the best known songs, danced and sung by trap and reggaeton. With the artists of this musical genre more recognized as: Bad Bunny, Ozuna, Anuel AA, Noriel and other large number of artists.

In guess the song of trap you will find great songs and themes of trap like:
-I'm worse
-Krypy Kush
-Be prepared
-Alone
And many other additional songs!

Whats the game about?
Guess the song of Trap consists of correctly guessing and recognizing the name of the respective song of trap by means of its letter that is shown, the level of difficulty as the levels are overcome also grows, with less known songs or parts of the Confunsas letter to increase the difficulty and make this game of questions and answers much more fun.

Beat all levels in the shortest time possible to be the first to completely finish the game and show all your friends and family that you are a true fan and connoisseur of trap, rap and urban reggaeton.
