title: Never have I ever: Drinking Game by Naked Truth
description:
"Never Have I Ever", also known as "I've Never…" or "Ten Fingers", is a drinking game to get to know your friends.

The rules are simple:

1. Read the statement out loud.
2.  Anyone who at some point in their lives has done the action, must drink.
3. If you've never done it, don't drink.

This classic verbal drinking game starts with the players getting into a circle. Then, the first player reads a statement from the app starting with "Never have I ever...". Anyone who at some point in their lives has done the action that the first player reads, must drink. Play then continues around the circle, and the next person reads a statement.


NAUGHTY, DIRTY & FUN QUESTIONS
Do you want to spice up your party? With "Never have I ever: Naked Truth", things just got a bit naughtier! It’s the must-have game for all kinds of parties, events or to get to know someone - if you're brave enough! With dirty topics, you can reveal all, in this uncensored, unrestricted drinking game!


THE CRAZIEST DRINKING & PARTY GAME IN THE PALM OF YOUR HAND
Skip "Spin the Bottle" and "Truth or Dare" - because "Never have I ever: Naked Truth" will lead your party to a brand-new level. This game is more than just "breaking the ice". Get as many people and friends around the game, gather some shot glasses and let the party begin. What have, and what haven’t you and your friends done? You will find it out.


SWIPE THROUGH TO GET NEW QUESTIONS
If you haven’t done it, your friends might have - and that’s the aim of the game in "Never have I ever: Naked Truth". Speak the truth about what you haven’t done and see which of your people cannot say the same about themselves. You will be surprised, who is the most daring! You might even discover some dirty secrets! 


DIRTY, SEXY AND UNRESTRICTED DRINKING GAME!
Gather all of your people and let "Never have I ever: Naked Truth" lead the way. Pass the phone around, and take a shot if you have done what they haven’t - it’s fun, naughty and entirely unrestricted! Play your way through those naughty categories.


Reveal the truth and spice things up in this addictive drinking game for Android!

Keep in mind; this game is exclusively for adults. If you're too young or easily offended, this game might not be for you.

And remember: Drink responsibly and don't drive afterwards!

Skip "Spin the Bottle" and "Truth or Dare" - because "Never have I ever: Naked Truth" will lead your party to a brand-new level. This game is more than just "breaking the ice". Get as many people and friends around the game, gather some shot glasses and let the party begin. What have, and what haven’t you and your friends done? You will find it out.


SWIPE THROUGH TO GET NEW QUESTIONS
If you haven’t done it, your friends might have - and that’s the aim of the game in "Never have I ever: Naked Truth". Speak the truth about what you haven’t done and see which of your people cannot say the same about themselves. You will be surprised, who is the most daring! You might even discover some dirty secrets!


DIRTY, SEXY AND UNRESTRICTED DRINKING GAME!
Gather all of your people and let "Never have I ever: Naked Truth" lead the way. Pass the phone around, and take a shot if you have done what they haven’t - it’s fun, naughty and entirely unrestricted! Play your way through those naughty categories.


Reveal the truth and spice things up in this addictive drinking game for Android!

Keep in mind; this game is exclusively for adults. If you're too young or easily offended, this game might not be for you.

And remember: Drink responsibly and don't drive afterwards!
summary: Party hard with dirty questions and drinks. I've never - group quiz for adults.

title: OX 퀴즈 서바이벌 100
description:
쉽고 재미있는 OX 퀴즈를 맞추며 신나게 달려보세요!
목표는 100명 중 최후의 1인이 되는 것!

제한시간 5초 안에
O와 X 중 한 쪽으로 이동만 하면 됩니다.

정답인 쪽은 일단 생존!
오답인 쪽은 무서운 벌칙이 기다리고 있어요~~

제한시간 내에 선택지는 얼마든지 바꿀 수 있답니다.
눈치 싸움도 중요하겠죠?

열심히 퀴즈를 풀어서
유치원부터 퀴즈의 신까지 레벨업!
개성 넘치는 캐릭터도 마구마구 모아보세요!

하면 할 수록 똑똑해지고~
하면 할 수록 재미가 넘치는~
레알 유니크 퀴즈 게임!

긴장감 백배! 쾌감 만배!!
최후의 1인이 되는 그 순간까지
OX 퀴즈를 멈추지 마세요!


※필수권한
- 휴대폰 : 게임 중 전화통화, 홈버튼을 통한 게임전환 시 게임상태를 유지하기 위해 기기의 상태를 확인하는 권한입니다.
- 사진/미디어/파일 : 게임 중 캡처한 게임화면을 저장하기 위한 권한입니다.
- 저장공간 : 게임을 설치하거나 게임 데이터를 저장하고 읽어오기 위한 권한입니다.

 ※접근 권한 철회 방법
- 운영체제 6.0 이상 : 설정>어플리케이션 관리자>앱 선택> 권한>접근권한 철회 가능합니다.
- 운영체제 6.0 미만 : 접근권한 철회가 불가능하므로, 앱 삭제로 철회 가능합니다.
----
개발자 연락처 :
A-407,452, Yangcheon-ro, Gangseo-gu, Seoul 07574, Republic of Korea
+82-70-4077-1100

title: Hi Guess the Character
description:
Can you recognize who’s the famous character in the image? They’re from movies, TV shows, cartoons, comics and games. Come and challenge the best trivia icon quiz now!

Do you want something fresh? Try this most addictive different guessing icon game. See the face moved image and guess the role it stands for.

Hundreds of funny puzzles are waiting for you. Challenge your brain power by guessing as many characters in the pictures solo as you can, or to challenge your friends to check who can recognize more. You will never feel dull and boring! Those famous and widely known characters like Superman, Mickey Mouse, Captain Jack Sparrow, Santa Claus and other superheroes are from popular movies, video games, cartoons, comics, TV shows, film posters, fairy tales and magazines. The game is very simple to operate! You just need to guess the character in the picture of each puzzle by tapping the letters on the board which you think correct.

Stuck in a hard puzzle? Take ease, if you really can’t figure out it, the hints are ready to help. You just need to tap the “Reveal Letter” button to show a random correct letter, the “Remove Letters” function will help you to remove the incorrect letters. And if you want to access the next puzzle directly, you can tap the button of “Skip Puzzle”. Use these hints if you're totally stuck! Besides, if you already run out of these free hints, you can get more free ones by watching video ads or share it to Facebook.

Take action! Download it immediately! Enjoy never ending fun!

Features:
Easy to start, simple to play!
Free, no registration required. Simple operation! See the image and guess the character by tapping the correct letters.

Best, challenging, addictive puzzles and never ending fun!
Hundreds of puzzles are waiting for you to challenge! Those pictures are designed by according the role prototypes from animations, movies, video games, TV shows etc. Experience the funny quiz and enjoy ultimate fun!

Cute, fresh and vivid high quality graphics!
The perfect and comfortable color matches and cute well-designed images offer you a visual enjoyment!

Continuous updates, endless amazing puzzles and everlasting fun!
Continuous version updates, we always add new puzzles for players. Your fun never ends!

Hints & help are ready to help you! Play with friends, shared fun!
Share the game to friends or play with them to enjoy the unexpected fun! Stuck in a difficult puzzle? Relax, you can use the hints we provided or share it to your friends on Facebook to ask for help. You also can post the puzzles you have solved to test your friends. Or challenge them to find out who can recognize more.

title: European Countries - Maps, Flags and Capitals Quiz
description:
If you know all countries in Europe, you can test your knowledge. 
If you don't know flags or capitals of European countries, or where they are situated on the map of Europe, you'll acquire all this information from this simple and entertaining app. 

* 51 European countries: 
- All independent nations, including 6 transcontinental states situated both in Europe and Asia (Russia, Turkey, Georgia, Armenia, Azerbaijan, and Kazakhstan).
- Cyprus, an island country in the Eastern Mediterranean and a member of the European Union (EU).
- Kosovo, a partially recognized state in Southeast Europe.
- Even city-states such as Luxembourg and Vatican.
* All flags.
* All maps.
* All capitals - for example, Bratislava is the capital city of Slovakia.
* Currencies of Europe: from euro and British pound sterling to Swiss franc and Norwegian krone.

Choose the game mode: 
1) Spelling quizzes (easy and hard).
2) Multiple-choice questions (with 4 or 6 answer options). It’s important to remember that you have only 3 lives.
3) Time game (give as many answers as you can in 1 minute) - you should give more than 25 correct answers to get a star.
4) New game mode: Identify capital cities on the map.
Two learning tools:
* Flashcards.
* Table of all countries.

The app is translated into 23 languages, including the most important European languages (English, German, Spanish and many others). So you can learn the names of those countries in any of these languages. Just switch between them in the app’s Settings!

It is a very good application for people who study European geography or are going to travel to Europe.
From Iceland and Scandinavia to Great Britain and Portugal. From Reykjavík to Athens. The European journey begins.

title: من سيربح المليون و المليونين
description:
تأتيكم لعبة البرنامج التلفزيوني الشهير و لعبة الأسئلة و الأجوبة الثقافية من سيربح المليون بالجديد و طريقة جديدة في اللعب.

من سيربح المليون لم يعد مليونا واحدا بل مليونين.

في هذا الإصدار تأتكم اللعبة بميزة جديدة ستجعل اللعب أحلى و أمتع : يمكنكم الآن اللعب و الإستمتاع بالمسابقات اليومية بفضل الأسئلة المتجددة يوميا في جميع المجالات. يكفي الضغط على "المسابقة اليومية" من القائمة ثم إختيار المسابقة و بداية اللعب.

قم بالإجابة على خمسة عشر سؤالا ثقافيا لتفوز بمليون ريال سعودي
ميزات اللعبة :
- طريقتين للعب : اللعب بطريقة نظامية واللعب بسرعة.
- التدرج في صعوبة الأسئلة.
- إظافة وسيلة مساعدة رابعة وهي تغيير السؤال بعد السؤال الخامس.
- إستعمال الأصوات في وسيلة المساعدة الإتصال بصديق.
- إستعمال الأصوات و الإرشادات في جميع مراحل اللعبة عنذ اللعب بطريقة نظامية.
- إمكانية الإنسحاب و الإحتفاظ بالرصيد.
- إمكانية مراجعة جميع أسئلة آخر لعبة و أجوبتها و قراءة معلومات و تفاصيل إضافية متعلقة بالسؤال ( لقراءة المعلومات الإضافية يجب أن تتوفر على إتصال بالنت)
- مشاهدة الشيك يحمل إسمك و المبلغ المحصل عليه.
- إمكانية تسجيل الأرصدة و الرجوع إليها و مشاهدة الشيكات في أي وقت.
- التحكم في اللعبة بالأوامر الصوتية
للتحكم بالصوت في اللعبة : 
يجب عليك أولا أن تتوفر عل إتصال بالنت
ثم إختيار اللغة العربية كلغة للبحث الصوتي كما يلي :
اضغط على زر القائمة 
اضغط على الضبط
اختر اللغة و الإدخال
اختر البحث الصوتي
اضغط على خيار اللغة
ثم اختر العربية 

للتحكم في اللعبة بصوتك إستعمل الجمل التالية بعد أن تضغط على زر التحكم الصوتي :

لحذف إجابتين قل : حذف إجابتين أو قل : نحذف إجابتين 
للإتصال بصديق قل : إتصال بصديق أو قل : أتصل بصديق
لأخد رأي الجمهور قل : مساعدة الجمهور أو قل : أسأل الجمهور
لتغيير السؤال قل : تغيير السؤال أو قل : تبديل السؤال
لإختيار الإجابة ألف قل : الإجابة الأولى أو قل : إجابة ألف أو قم فقط بنطق إسم الحرف : ألف 
لإختيار الإجابة باء قل : الإجابة الثانية أو قل : إجابة باء أو قم فقط بنطق إسم الحرف : باء 
لإختيار الإجابة جيم قل : الإجابة الثالثة أو قل : إجابة جيم أو قم فقط بنطق إسم الحرف : جيم 
لإختيار الإجابة دال قل : الإجابة الرابعة أو قل : إجابة دال أو قم فقط بنطق إسم الحرف : دال
للإنسحاب من اللعبة قل : إنسحاب أو قل : أنسحب

يمكنك تفعيل خاصية الإستماع الأوتوماتيكي لإجابتك بصوتك من الإعدادات : 
إذهب إلى الإعدادات ثم قم بالضغط على التحكم الصوتي و أدخل عدد الثواني التي بعدها تستمع اللعبة إلى إجابتك

تأتيكم لعبة البرنامج التلفزيوني الشهير و لعبة الأسئلة و الأجوبة الثقافية من سيربح المليون بالجديد و طريقة جديدة في اللعب.

من سيربح المليون لم يعد مليونا واحدا بل مليونين.

في هذا الإصدار تأتكم اللعبة بميزة جديدة ستجعل اللعب أحلى و أمتع : يمكنكم الآن اللعب و الإستمتاع بالمسابقات اليومية بفضل الأسئلة المتجددة يوميا في جميع المجالات. يكفي الضغط على "المسابقة اليومية" من القائمة ثم إختيار المسابقة و بداية اللعب.

قم بالإجابة على خمسة عشر سؤالا ثقافيا لتفوز بمليون ريال سعودي
ميزات اللعبة :
- طريقتين للعب : اللعب بطريقة نظامية واللعب بسرعة.
- التدرج في صعوبة الأسئلة.
- إظافة وسيلة مساعدة رابعة وهي تغيير السؤال بعد السؤال الخامس.
- إستعمال الأصوات في وسيلة المساعدة الإتصال بصديق.
- إستعمال الأصوات و الإرشادات في جميع مراحل اللعبة عنذ اللعب بطريقة نظامية.
- إمكانية الإنسحاب و الإحتفاظ بالرصيد.
- إمكانية مراجعة جميع أسئلة آخر لعبة و أجوبتها و قراءة معلومات و تفاصيل إضافية متعلقة بالسؤال ( لقراءة المعلومات الإضافية يجب أن تتوفر على إتصال بالنت)
- مشاهدة الشيك يحمل إسمك و المبلغ المحصل عليه.
- إمكانية تسجيل الأرصدة و الرجوع إليها و مشاهدة الشيكات في أي وقت.
- التحكم في اللعبة بالأوامر الصوتية
للتحكم بالصوت في اللعبة :
يجب عليك أولا أن تتوفر عل إتصال بالنت
ثم إختيار اللغة العربية كلغة للبحث الصوتي كما يلي :
اضغط على زر القائمة
اضغط على الضبط
اختر اللغة و الإدخال
اختر البحث الصوتي
اضغط على خيار اللغة
ثم اختر العربية

للتحكم في اللعبة بصوتك إستعمل الجمل التالية بعد أن تضغط على زر التحكم الصوتي :

لحذف إجابتين قل : حذف إجابتين أو قل : نحذف إجابتين
للإتصال بصديق قل : إتصال بصديق أو قل : أتصل بصديق
لأخد رأي الجمهور قل : مساعدة الجمهور أو قل : أسأل الجمهور
لتغيير السؤال قل : تغيير السؤال أو قل : تبديل السؤال
لإختيار الإجابة ألف قل : الإجابة الأولى أو قل : إجابة ألف أو قم فقط بنطق إسم الحرف : ألف
لإختيار الإجابة باء قل : الإجابة الثانية أو قل : إجابة باء أو قم فقط بنطق إسم الحرف : باء
لإختيار الإجابة جيم قل : الإجابة الثالثة أو قل : إجابة جيم أو قم فقط بنطق إسم الحرف : جيم
لإختيار الإجابة دال قل : الإجابة الرابعة أو قل : إجابة دال أو قم فقط بنطق إسم الحرف : دال
للإنسحاب من اللعبة قل : إنسحاب أو قل : أنسحب

يمكنك تفعيل خاصية الإستماع الأوتوماتيكي لإجابتك بصوتك من الإعدادات :
إذهب إلى الإعدادات ثم قم بالضغط على التحكم الصوتي و أدخل عدد الثواني التي بعدها تستمع اللعبة إلى إجابتك
summary: Cultural Encyclopedia of the game and win a million and Alumblyonyen

title: Cat Breeds - Identify Your Cat
description:
Who is This Cat?

Identify the Cat App – Fun Cats Game . Identify Your Cat - Cat Breeds

When you are looking for a fun game to play that involves cats, you will need to look no farther because we have the cat game for you. 

The free cat app will allow you to play a game called Identify the Cat. This type of cat game is used as a cat app on the android system. 

The free cat app is great app. It is not a very big app but it is a lot of fun.

It will teach you about different cats and you will get to try and guess which cat they are talking about. The Cat App will show you a picture and give you four choices to choose from. You will then get to pick which cat you think is in the picture. Once you choose the right answer you will be aloud to move on to the next cat. 

Not only will you be learning what the cats look like, but you will learn about each cat in particular. App will give you a description of the cat and tell you things such as what they eat, how much they weight, what they look like and where they originated from. You will be able to learn a lot from this app but still have fun while you are learning. 

If you are wanting to learn about cats then you have come to the right place because you will not only be having fun on your phone while trying to stay occupied but you will also be learning about many different cats.

The graphics on this app are very good and the pictures that they have are very real looking and the color is great. You will not ever get tired of looking at the pictures of the cats. 

This game is rated for all ages, so if you are in a meeting or an appointment and you need to keep your child busy so they stay out of trouble then you will want to use this app to do that. It will be a lot of for them to look at the different cats and try to guess which cat they are looking at. 

You will not regret downloading this small app for your phone because it is packed with a lot of information and fun gamming time. Start playing today!

The domestic cat is a small, usually furry, domesticated, and carnivorous mammal. It is often called the housecat when kept as an indoor pet, or simply the cat when there is no need to distinguish it from other felids and felines.
By downloading this app you are agreeing to our terms of service; http://sndapps.com/terms-of-service

title: Stacker Mahjong 3D  II - Fantasy World
description:
This is an amazing world made from exquisite boxes, and your goal is  to eliminate them all. 
Are you bored with old match game? You are going to challenge with uncountable boxes here！Besides, there are mahjong and fruit pattern for you to choose. 
Although it is same levels, the assembly is totally different. 
Ｗho is the winner? you? or your friends?  
Download and challenge now！

Features:
# Thousands of 3D boxes match game.
# Apply mahjong and fruit pattern.
# Desert, sparkling sky, and low poly style are waiting for your exploration in the fantasy world.
# Use one finger to press and rotate the fantasy world, and use two fingers to zoom the screen.
# Apply hints.
# totally free.

How to play: 
Choose two boxes with same pattern to eliminate, and you can eliminate boxes in two situation: One is there are blank at the boxes' left or right; another is the box you choose is same pattern to next box.You will win after tearing down all of the boxes.

# Use two fingers to zoom the screen, and use one finger to press and rotate the world.
# Lock: To prevent from choosing other area.
# Zoom: Zoom in and out to have a panoramic view.
#Hint: Every level has hint and it can tell you the boxes which can be matched, maybe you can pass the level at a critical time by the hint.

title: The Wall 3D
description:
Plinko meets trivia in The Wall 3D! An out of this world game show! Answer trivia questions correctly and you will earn money where your balls land! Answer incorrectly and they will take money away! The Wall 3D features fast scoring gameplay that will test your mind.

Higher values are place on the right side of The Wall. If you are confident in your ability to answer a question correctly- place your balls on the right side of the wall.

How to Play The Wall 3D

- Phase 1: Money Balls -
Choose 2 locations on The Wall to drop money balls. These balls will instantly gain you money wherever they land.  Be warned though- Negative Balls will be dropped from these same locations at the end of the game.

- Phase 2: Trivia Balls -
You will be asked 3 questions. Each time you answer correctly your trivia ball will turn into a money ball and gain you money where it lands!  If your answer incorrectly, your trivia ball will turn into a negative ball and will take money away!

- Phase 3 -
2 negative balls will be dropped from the same locations that you dropped your money balls from during phase 1.

With a little luck and skill you could become the next Space Millionaire!

The Wall 3D is a game show that takes place in outer space! Earn Space Cash and collect amazing trophies.

title: Quiziest for Friends & Couples
description:
How well do the people in your life really know you? It's time to find out! Borrowing elements from popular newlywed and relationship game shows of the 60s and 70s, Quiziest pits your friends in battles against each other using true or false quizzes crafted by you.

* Build from a collection of 150+ ready-to-go questions or edit any of them to create completely custom quizzes
* Save your favorites for later in order to track player performance and to test future friendships and relationships
* Quiziest's statistics and ratings provide an overview of how well loved ones can identify with you across a range of topics
* Questions are appropriate for all age groups and relationship types, including new friends and established couples

Gameplay is very straightforward. We'll ask you to answer ten true/false questions and then to hand your device off to another player. This person can be your best friend, a boyfriend or girlfriend, a family member... whoever. The second player is then invited to answer the same questions as they believe you would have.

At the end of each quiz, we'll provide the second player with a score based on the number of matching answers they selected. You can review cumulative player scores at any time to see how friendships and relationships of the past and present compare at a glance.

Our quiz building process is unlike any other: questions can be edited to fit relationship quizzes and friendship quizzes alike. After editing a question, you can even recategorize it under a topic of your choosing. Available topics include personality, style, interests, talents, and taste.

Keep your friends on their toes by saving new quizzes regularly. Combinations of pre-written questions are near limitless already, but the ability to build your own questions with Quiziest ensures that you'll never run out of engaging true or false quizzes.

Gameplay is very straightforward. We'll ask you to answer ten true/false questions and then to hand your device off to another player. This person can be your best friend, a boyfriend or girlfriend, a family member... whoever. The second player is then invited to answer the same questions as they believe you would have.

At the end of each quiz, we'll provide the second player with a score based on the number of matching answers they selected. You can review cumulative player scores at any time to see how friendships and relationships of the past and present compare at a glance.

Our quiz building process is unlike any other: questions can be edited to fit relationship quizzes and friendship quizzes alike. After editing a question, you can even recategorize it under a topic of your choosing. Available topics include personality, style, interests, talents, and taste.

Keep your friends on their toes by saving new quizzes regularly. Combinations of pre-written questions are near limitless already, but the ability to build your own questions with Quiziest ensures that you'll never run out of engaging true or false quizzes.
summary: Featuring beautiful and infinitely customizable quizzes - it's Quiziest!
recentChanges:
* Expanded device support
* Fixed a custom quiz question bug

title: Merge Soldiers!
description:
Monster army pressure, the castle is at stake, as a soldier can you highlight the tight encirclement?
This is a 2048 like puzzle game where you can drag soldiers to merge them in the matrix, then command them to attack the enemy.
Simply drag the farmer and sword to create a more powerful soldier, and the same soldiers can merge to a higher level arms.
If there is no removable space, it does not matter, you can use a variety of skills to unlock!
When the lineup is completed, breakout, beat the monsters, and get a variety of monster illustrations.
You can continue to challenge more difficult, unlock more arms illustrations.

title: Superbuzzer Trivia Quiz Game
description:
SUPERBUZZER Trivia Quiz Game is the best real-time multiplayer trivia quiz game ever! Challenge your friends or random players and beat them with your knowledge – available on Android, Facebook, iPhone or iPad. 

SUPERBUZZER Trivia Quiz Game really makes you want to buzz! Download the game now!

Speed, strategy, excitement – there’s no end to the challenges that await you here! Every game consists of a maximum of 3 rounds. 

1.	Round: Survive the “Point Race” against the other players. 
2.	Round: Win “The Sprint” to qualify for the final.
3.	Round: The “Final Fight”, where you knock your opponent out with a series of 
right answers to win the game and quiz your way up to the Masters!

It's time to buzz! Download the game now! 

Key Features: 

LIVE MULTIPLAYER TRIVIA GAME
Play against real players in real-time! Smash the buzzer before the others do and win the game.

WIDE RANGE OF QUESTIONS AND TOPICS
Quiz yourself with thousands of questions across 70 different topics (history, geography, celebrities, movie & TV, science and many more).

CROSS-PLATFORM EXPERIENCE
Play in real-time against friends and random opponents, regardless of whether they play SUPERBUZZER Trivia Quiz Game on Android, Facebook, iPhone or iPad. This is multiplayer game experience at it’s best. 

WEEKLY COMPETITIONS & HIGH-SCORE LISTS 
New competitions start every Monday. Compete against your friends and take the lead in the high-score lists. Free games are the reward for the best quizzers! Compare yourself with your friends and SUPERBUZZER players all over the world in our high-score lists. Become the BUZZER CHAMPION!

UNLOCK A VARIETY OF TROPHIES/BADGES
There are over 100 trophies waiting to be unlocked. The more you win, the more you can decorate your profile with new titles, buzzers, gloves, and themes. 

EARN NEW GAMES
When you reach a new level, a new game is unlocked – and the same for every new friend you add.


Are you a member of our Facebook community? Join us at https://www.facebook.com/Superbuzzer

If you are having technical issues or if you have any questions, we're here to help. Please send us an email to: support@thesuperbuzzer.com or use our support website: http://support.gerwinsoftware.com


Please Note: 
SUPERBUZZER is completely free to play, however you can buy credits for real money. You may control in-app purchases made within this app using the password settings explained in the Google Play help center..

title: The Wall Plinko
description:
The Wall Plinko is one of the popular game well-known as the price is right plinko. 
The game contains all kinds of turns and twists that make it entertaining for everyone. It usually consists of an arrangement of both luck and guessing 

 How to play plinko game 
A contestant has to earn some drinko Plinko plucks when playing the game. Therefore, the contestant has to choose the correct digits in each of the Price is Right game small prizes. In turn, you will receive Plinko pucks once you choose a correct digit. You are allowed to win a maximum of five pucks only. The contestant will then climb the top of Plinko board once he or she has received their pucks. The final step involves the contestant dropping the pucks from the top.

Features
The Plinko game is made of pegs each attached to the Plinko board. This board despite being flexible, it is very strong and durable. One can be able to win money. 

 Why download the wall game? 
The wall game has got six bonus games which are fascinating and can enable you to win massive prizes. You will get the chance of tripling your jackpot once you have won the wall jackpot. This game is also absolutely free to play.!

description:
This is a great way to play the classic game of Truth or Dare. Over 600 Truth and Dare questions. Enjoy the game as a party game or as any other casual entertainment. The game allows up to 14 players to join.  Fast, fun, and simple! This game has a focus on multiplayer. Use the "press" button to randomly generate whose turn it will be to play. On the truth/dare screen, swipe from left to right to generate next question. Additionally, you can swipe right to left to pick new truth/dare.

title: 4 Pics 1 Word: Trivia
description:
If you like guessing games and can't let go of your phone, this fun 4 Pics 1 Word Puzzle Plus Quiz is made for you. It's very likely that you've already played it and you're stuck on a level, whose images you can't assimilate to get it right. Try this Awesome Photo Game for you!

On Internet we can find a lot of tricks and traps to advance the level and it turns out to be a pretty addictive game. Four photos a word is a trivial game that you can get for free  in all versions of mobile, both for iOS and Android, and the more inches your screen has, the more details you can capture to guess.

There are many guessing games that Playstore has, but this one, without a doubt, has all the extras that make it the undisputed king of the Questions and Answers category. In addition, it adapts to all ages, so both children and adults can play it. Its rules are very simple. In each of its levels is shown a set of photos and you only have to guess the word that form the 4 images. As you increase the level, the degree of difficulty becomes greater.

The interesting thing is that this guessing game involves a quiz of photos that must relate to each other. The sound emitted by the game is very catchy , and its clues will help you advance in the game and not want to leave it. 

Although it's free, there is also the option to make some purchases, called micro transactions that allow you to get clues and advance faster level. This application has received excellent reviews by various digital media, achieving ratings that revolve around 4/5 stars. 

TRIVIAL CHARACTERISTICS

✅ Translated into 4 languages: Spanish, English, French and German.
✅ More than 120 levels available.
✅ Rewards system with coins to solve levels.
✅ Adapted to Tablets and Smartphones of any resolution.
✅ Lightweight size for downloading in countries with slow connections.
✅ Use tracks to download letters, add or even get direct feedback.


More about this Child's Trivia Game 

Encouraging curiosity and nourishing children's vocabulary can be done with these fun word games. Although technology has recently been besieged as an insulator of people, it must be stressed that the support it provides for teaching, learning and entertainment is unprecedented. 

Taking advantage of these applications for children to learn has made them more skilled, intelligent, able to learn different languages more quickly, as well as helping them in their process of learning to read, write, add and subtract.  

Tips to overcome levels and guess photos

The best trick is to read a lot, always the one who reads the most is the one who knows the most. But if it's about improving the game's strategy, here are a few:

● Do not use the hints unless it is extremely necessary.
● Do not be literal in reading the images, sometimes just a small detail will give you the answer.
● If you use the hints, the first one you should use is the discard letter. This will allow you to make the combinations with greater precision.
● Connect your game with social networks, having the help of your friends is always effective and also a lot of fun. 

In case of doubts, deletion of photographs or any other matter related to the App, you can contact us through the e-mail address provided below.

title: The Idiot Test
description:
The Idiot Test is the brand new game, where you can play and check your IQ.

Questions are funny but hard to understand and complete. Some users call impossible game or impossible quiz, but the real name is the idiot test. 

One of our users said that: "This game is real deal and worlds hardest game ever". But you have to try to see the game in action.

The style of this game is something like the moron test or the idiot quiz, like everybody is used to play. 

The Idiot Test has more than 50 hard levels to complete. 

You have 3 life and many checkpoints, so completing checkpoint will give you possibility to resume the game from the last points.

There are hints on every level and option to skip the question, but if you really want to know real IQ, please do your best. 

Bear in mind, that people think that this is the stupid test, but worlds hardest game to beat.

title: Movie Trivia: Disney Movies
description:
Challenge yourself with this all-encompassing trivia game on Disney movies.  From the early Disney movies like Snow White and Pinocchio to recent film like Cars 3 and Coco, this game covers it all.  Both animated and live-action movies are included.  (We're not including Star Wars movies just yet...)

The game has 5 different ways to play:  10 questions, 20 questions, 50 questions, unlimited questions, and unlimited up to 5 wrong answers.  Each game has its own online leaderboard.

The game is easy to play and the ads won't overwhelm you.  Best of all, its free!  Please leave us feedback or submit more questions at aztrivia.com - and check out our MANY other trivia games.

title: Seduction and Dating Quiz
description:
Welcome to the game “Seduction and Dating Quiz” – the App designed to turn you into a much more seductive person, able to win the hearts of beautiful women!

Seducing someone is a matter of attitude, showing the right initiative, at the right place and time. It’s not enough to know a handful of techniques or memorize a dozen clichés.

Knowing that the best school is practice, we developed the “Seduction and Dating Quiz” game, replete with everyday situations. You may have already experienced some of them or, indeed, you will experience them one day.

In each one of these situations or episodes, your goal will be to win over a girl, by making quick decisions and showing the right attitude!

*Develop your seductive instinct through a fun GAME that you won’t want to put down!

* Familiar settings such as the MOVIES, a RESTAURANT and the BEACH allow you to put in practice what you have learned!

* Enjoy the complete game without having to pay anything. Bonus: free updates with new and fun episodes!

* Don’t stay just in the online world! By winning a challenge, put what you’ve learned into practice and win over wonderful girls!

Synopsis:
#1 DINNER FOR TWO
You talked the girl into going out for dinner, you chose a nice restaurant and believe that night is already a victory... But to your surprise, the dinner doesn’t go exactly as expected, and a strange vibe develops. The evening ends with each one going home separately, without anything happening at all. Have you ever experienced this? 

Surely, the outcome of this story could have been different if you had made the right decisions. But where did you go wrong or fail to show the right attitude? Face this challenge and find out how to do better next time!

#2 ENJOYING AN EVENING AT THE CLUB
Is there secret to a perfect come-on at the club? Unfortunately, no! This task can be very difficult for those who are shy, especially for those who aren’t used to or are not comfortable with the risk of rejection. 

The best way to face the challenge is to think that winning a woman’s heart is like a game, where strategy, training and even a bit of luck are all part of it. Face this challenge better!

#3 AH, SUMMER!
It’s a long weekend and you decide to go to the beach. Sun, sea, cold beer and bikini-clad woman – top-notch! 

Summer is the best season to pick up women. What are you waiting for? Catch this wave, but don’t forget the sunscreen, after all, no girl is going to want date a lobster, right!?

#4 MOVIE DATE
Inviting a girl out to the movies can be a good plan if you don’t have intimacy with her. First, because most women love to go to the movies, and so the chances she’ll say yes are better. Also, the movie itself can yield good conversation and help you to overcome your shyness. Play this challenge and find out if your movie will have a happy ending!

*Enjoy Seduction and Dating Quiz game while it is free!!

title: Maps of All Countries in the World: Geography Quiz
description:
Guess all 197 independent countries of all continents by their outline maps! Geographic quiz over all regions of the Earth: from Europe and Asia to Africa and America.
Do you confuse Ireland and Iceland, or Sweden and Switzerland? Or do you believe that you are a geography expert? Then collect all stars in this game!

The maps are divided into two levels of difficulty:
1) well-known countries (Level 1) - New Zealand, Netherlands, Nigeria, etc.
2) exotic countries (Level 2) - Maldives, Equatorial Guinea, Marshall Islands, etc.
The third option is to play with “All Maps”.

In the new version of the game, you can study each continent separately:
1) Europe (51 states) - Austria, Spain, Czechia.
2) Asia (49 states) - Vietnam, Israel, Indonesia.
3) North and Central American (25 states) - United States, Jamaica, El Salvador.
4) South America (13 states) - Uruguay, Argentina, Chile.
5) Africa (54 states) - Morocco, South Africa, Ethiopia.
6) Australia and Oceania (15 states) - Papua New Guinea, New Caledonia, Federated States of Micronesia.

Choose one of several game modes and find the map of your country: 
* Spelling quizzes (easy and hard).
* Multiple-choice questions (with 4 answer options). It’s important to remember that you have only 3 lives.
* Time game (give as many answers as you can in 1 minute) - you should give more than 25 correct answers to get a star.
A learning tool:
* Flashcards - browse all maps without guessing.

The app is translated into 23 languages, including English, German, Spanish and many others. So you can learn the names of the countries in any of them.

The app doesn't require Internet connection and works offline.
Test your geography knowledge and find the map of your state!

title: Adivina la palabra correcta
description:
The game of guessing the correct word is a game of questions and answers which you are going to improve and expand your vocabulary and grammar of the Spanish language.
Test your knowledge and intelligence in a fun trivial game that helps you to think and to get mental agility and concentration.

You might ask yourself how much you know of primary and how much you know of secondary, but remember that in addition to general culture is very important to have a good level of grammar. In the 5 game modes available (grammar, synonyms, antonyms, definitions, and mixed) are questioned hundreds of verbs, adjectives, conjunctions, prepositions, etc ... and you just have to think and make the right choice between 3 possible.

- Grammar: Complete the sentence with the written word correctly
- Synonyms: choose the word with the same meaning
- Antonyms: Choose the word that has the opposite significance
- Definitions: guess the word that matches the definition
- Mixed: hit a blend of grammar, synonyms, antonyms and definitions

Expand and improve your vocabulary of Spanish language with 5 game modes available on Guess the right word. We do not know if you know more than a primary school kid but you will be a millionaire in richness of language at Spanish language ... so I think has been said!

For this game we have used the most important dictionary of the Spanish language that is the RAE (Royal Spanish Academy) and if you have questions you can visit their web www.rae.es to resolve it.

No time limit or aids or wildcards that difficult you when you play, just 1 question and 3 answers to choose from. You can play 10 or 20 questions each time and get different notes (suspense, approved, well, remarkable, outstanding and class honors). We assure you that ... Not all questioned get good grades! Which are you going to get? :)

If you want you can follow us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/PotencialmenteInteresanteApps

title: 94 Degrees Adventures
description:
94 Degrees Adventures, the new game from Scimob that tests your general knowledge! Quiz yourself with this free game. The questions cover a little bit of everything (geography, music, sports, film, TV, history, etc.) for you to enjoy by yourself or with friends.

Take off on an adventure and have fun while progressing through each world.

The concept is simple: one image, one hot zone to find.  The closer you are, the hotter you become. Get it? The correct answer is at 94°!

How old is George Clooney? How fast is Usain Bolt? When was the Margherita pizza invented? When was fire discovered? What film had the biggest budget? Where is the three-point line? If you know the answers, then download 94 Degrees Adventures for free to test your knowledge and have fun.

Features:
-Complete each series of general knowledge questions to progress through the worlds
-Check out the multiplayer mode and win the weekly challenge!
-Dozens of levels with a variety of themes
-Two types of jokers to help you find answers
-Ability to play without Internet connection (great when on planes or public transport!)
-Ask your friends for help when you can’t find the answer
-Get rewarded when you do well! Win coin chests, jokers and more energy
-Play in English

title: Music Trivia Game
description:
If you are a true music fan and you think you know everything about it, we dare you to download Music Trivia Game and test your knowledge! From the oldest music bands to the newest hit, we have it all in a quiz format! Test what you know and get surprised by the new details that you will learn with this game.

Trust us, we have questions about the basic information and all the front page news about the music industry! So, what are you waiting for? Download Music Trivia Game now and test what you actually know! If you like it, don’t forget to rate it!♕ If you think you know it all and want to test your knowledge or you just want to have a game to pass the time, Music Trivia Game will be perfect for you! Try now this fun quiz and we promise that you will find some interesting new facts!

♕ You have up to 100 questions, divided in 10 levels from easy to hard. Don’t jump to conclusion that it’s going to be easy, you have maximum 20 seconds to respond, so act fast. If you are unsure of the answers you can use the hints that this game provides you.

How to you play this trivia game:• Select the unlocked level.
• The faster and accurate you answer the questions the more starts you will get!
• If you fail to answer to 3 questions out of the 10, the game will end but you can restart the level.
• Once you completed a level, the next one will unlock. The levels will get harder as you progress.

Another fun thing you have is the statistics panel where you can see your progress in the game.

We dare you, download Music Trivia Game and test your knowledge!
If you finished this fun quiz you can choose another trivia topic or quiz app from the list presented in the app!

title: Gravity Quiz
description:
Gravity Quiz is a game created for fans of the mysterious tv series: Gravity Falls.

The game has modified images of the main characters of the series and you must guess all the names.

At the beginning of the game you will find the main characters, such as: Dipper, Mabel, Stan, Pacifica, Wendy, among others, but as you advance the game will be complicated and only the best fans of Gravity Falls can overcome all levels.

Each time you answer a question, you will get coins that you can use to buy hints and thus move faster. If you do not know the name of a character, you can ask a friend for help.

CHARACTERISTICS:

- The game has more than 50 levels with Gravity Falls characters.
- The names of the characters are in their original language.
- If you complete the game leave a comment and we will add more levels.

DISCLAIMER

This is an unofficial game from Gravity Falls, created by fans for fans of the series.

title: Food Fun Trivia Questions Quiz
descriptionHTML:
“Food Fun Trivia Questions Quiz” is a trivia game about different types of food that are popular in the world. Food quizzes are very interesting and can be educative. This food trivia is exactly one such game! Tons of quiz trivia questions are awaiting you in this fantastic quiz game! If you are a food guru and want to learn about some popular world dishes and cuisines, everything you have to do is download this educational picture quiz and you will be delighted to find out about a multitude of new and interesting facts from the world of food! What is your favorite dish? Find it in this awesome picture trivia quiz! Learn about different types of food in an effective way via this trivia game! Answer easy trivia questions and progress to more difficult ones! If you know many fun facts about different "dishes" and cuisines and you are a fan of "super fun games" for learning and free quizzes, download this free trivia game and test your knowledge now!

➜ 5 levels of difficulty in the endless quiz questions and answers;
➜ Play “food quiz”, choose one of 4 offered answers and do it fast, the clock is ticking;
➜ Give the answer quickly and win extra points for being fast;
➜ Be careful not to make three errors in a row or else you'll have to start over;
➜ Use one of 3 available helps to solve the questions:
**50:50 – remove two incorrect answers;
**Switch your question with another one;
**Use the help of your friends – take a look at their answers shown in percent.

“Food Fun Trivia Questions Quiz” is the ultimate food game for you! A large collection of worldwide food items is now available! Download this awesome trivia game and discover a lot of types of dishes from different regions! Challenge your friends and see if you can beat their high scores! Food is any substance consumed to provide nutritional support for the body. It is usually of plant or animal origin, and contains essential nutrients, such as fats, proteins, vitamins, or minerals. What is the national dish of your country? Can you recognize it in the picture? How much do you really know about what we eat? Check your knowledge and learn what you didn't know via this trivia game! Guess the fruit or vegetable in the picture and answer quiz trivia questions! Food is essential for our survival. Check how much you know about various cuisines and what people around the globe eat! Find your own favorite dish among the game trivia questions and tell your friends about this fun trivia quiz! title: Boy or Girl - Gender predictor
description:
Boy or Girl - Gender Predictor  is a very useful app which will allow you to predict accurately the gender of your upcoming child. With its wide range of methods; it is one of the best apps for moms. You can make gender test at home with this app.

There are a lot of methods within the app to predict your unborn child gender:

• Special Test

• Renewal of Blood

• Blood Type

• Chinese Method chart and calculator

• Mayan Chart

• Japanese Method

This app answers the next questions: Am I having boy or girl? How to know baby gender? Will I have boy or girl? What determines the gender of a baby?

If you are pregnant then it’s an opportunity for you to start planning.

Don’t waste your time in guessing on your own. Use this baby gender predictor app to know the best possible result. An adorable girl or a sharp boy? This gender test will allow you to predict it easily. The methods which are available in this baby predictor app are used by gurus in different regions of the world and you will find all of these “boy or girl” predictor methods within this amazing app.

Why do you need to download and install Gender Predictor calculator on your Android smartphone or tablet instead of other pregnancy gender test games?

★ Nice ★

✓ We made some Cool and smooth high-quality graphics to give you the best experience while playing the greatest gender test trivia game ever! You will enjoy it!

★ Free ★

✓ Our Baby gender test game is FREE and it will stay Free for life, so there are No hidden fees, no special memberships, and no annual subscription fees.

★ Enjoy it anytime & anywhere ★

✓ want to enjoy playing our trivia game anytime? It’s possible because our baby gender predictor game supports the offline mode and you can enjoy playing even if you don’t have a 3G, 4G or Wi-Fi internet connection.

✓ Want to enjoy playing our pregnancy gender quiz anywhere? It’s possible because our game is responsive and you can enjoy playing on your Android smartphone or tablet.

Following are the approaches and methods used as pregnancy gender test:

① Special Test

The special test will ask you 15 different questions. Your answers must be true and accurate. In the end, the method will calculate according to your answer and predict your baby gender. It will be more like a pregnancy test quiz for you.

② Renewal of Blood

It’s easy and simple. You just have to enter your and your husband’s age and it will predict spot on!

③ Blood Type

In this method, you will need some extra information. You will have to put your blood group, your Rh factor, father’s blood group, and father’s Rh factor.

④ Chinese Method

Chinese gender predictor (birth calendar and cart) is a method which will require the mother’s age and month of conception.

⑤ Mayan Chart

Mayan Chart method is very rare and you will just need to put the mother’s age, and year of conception to get the predicted result.

⑥ Japanese Method

Japanese method is also very popular and it requires a mother’s birth month, father’s birth month, and month of conception.

Note:

More methods shall be added in upcoming updates.

Your suggestions are important to us. Please don’t hesitate to send us an Email.

title: Live Quiz Games App, Trivia & Gaming App for Money
description:
BaaziNow Live Games App – Play Live Trivia Games, live quiz, bingo game & live poll game, win & get instant cash in PayTM or Mobikwik wallets

BaaziNow is a Live Free Games App by Times Internet Limited where you can play trivia quiz game show, online bingo game & guess all answers with millions of other users to win cash. BaaziNow, gaming app features BrainBaazi - a live trivia quiz game show, BingoBaazi – a live bingo games show & PollBaazi where majority wins.
Get ready for live quiz game, fun quiz & bingo game to play online!

Download BaaziNow app now, play BrainBaazi - live quiz & test your trivia quiz skills at 8:30 PM for Rs. 1,00,000 everyday & afternoon show at 1.00 PM for Rs. 20,000 Monday to Friday, bingo game at 4.30 PM for Rs. 20,000 or PollBaazi at 3:00 PM for 5,000 & Rs. 9:00 PM for Rs. 10,000 daily.

Refer BaaziNow online trivia quiz games app, bingo game app to your family, friends & colleagues for an extra life.
BrainBaazi-Live Trivia & Quiz Game Show
BrainBaazi is one of the most innovative online trivia quiz games in India where you compete with millions of players in live quiz game. The host asks questions, which you have to answer correctly to win the cash prize.
How to Play Live Quiz? 
* Download the BaaziNow online game app
* Sign up using your mobile number & OTP
* The host will ask questions, each having 3 options. Only one of these options is correct
* Players get only 10 seconds to answer each question
* If your answer is incorrect or you run out of time, then use your extra Life to be in the game
* Answer the Q9 Kal-Nayak Sawaal correctly without using your life to get an extra life at the end of quiz game. Both eliminated & non-eliminated users can answer this question
* Answer the 10th question correctly without using your life & you will be credited with your share of Rs. 30,000, only in 8:30PM show
* Everyday 10 minutes before quiz game starts, host shares cheat code to increase your chances of winning

How to play the PollBaazi? 
Go to PollBaazi to play & guess the quiz online. The anchor asks 8 questions with 3 options and 10 seconds to answer each. There will be no correct or incorrect answers, options with maximum submissions will be considered correct. Guess all questions correctly to win your share from prize money. You can play even after being eliminated, a late entry to the game or coming back after dropping because of the network glitch, also, use an extra life in the game to continue playing the game even after giving an incorrect answer.
 BingoBaazi – Live Bingo Game Show
Participate in BingoBaazi –live bingo game daily at 4.30 PM. Play online bingo game with millions of users & win cash. The anchor will call out numbers live, for which players will get 6 seconds to confirm. Enjoy bingo live game app to win loads of prizes! Download now to enjoy the bingo game!

 How to Play Bingo Live? 
* Go to BingoBaazi to play live bingo game
* Join the game every day at 4.30 PM to get a ticket, each having 3 rows & 15 numbers
* Players get 4 chances to win top, middle, bottom rows & full house
* Anchor will announce a number, players will get only 6 seconds to confirm each number
* If all the numbers in a row match the announced numbers, you will win the row prize
* After the claim, our system will verify the eligibility & prize money will be credited in your E-wallet
* If all the numbers of your ticket match the announced numbers before 36th call, you will win the grand prize for Full House
* Claimed prizes will be available at the top of the screen
* In case your claim is incorrect, we allow one bogus call per bingo game. 

We need the following permissions:
Location: To optimise streaming experience basis your geo
SMS: For mobile number verification
Mobile Number: To link your Paytm/Mobikwik wallet to transfer winning amount. We also use this to send you periodic show reminders
Follow us on Twitter & Facebook

title: 10s - Online Trivia Quiz with Video Chat
description:
Online 1v1 video quiz game which contains thousands of interesting trivia questions from various categories. 

Maybe you've played many quizs before, but have you tried talking to new people worldwide through a trivia app?

10s is a great platform  to talk with strangers while having fun. This online trivia app is really addictive and challenging.

Anyone can be the world champion and well known in this game! You can choose to play with your friends or be matched up against random opponent across the world. All kinds of hq trivia from real life to outer space is online for you. 

This game will present a true test of your level of education and knowledge so you can learn things and skills while playing it. Topics are ranging from general knowledge, geography, arts, science, popular culture, common sense, history, sports, great people, famous actors and so on. So try to find the right answer and beat your opponent. It’s a great choice and you will never get bored or disappointed!

Quiz with video mode makes it more interesting and special than any upwords games.You can talk to your opponent through the entire game. Interacting with him or her will reduce your tension and feel more relaxed. 

However, there is only 10 seconds for each question to choose the right answer! Faster speed will result in higher score and be on the ranking list! 

New questions arrived every week! Enjoy the game and hope you gain both knowledge and friendship here!

title: Guess the Cartoon Quiz
description:
The most awesome CARTOONS packed into ONE game!

HOW MANY OF THEM DO YOU KNOW? 

Have a look at the pic and guess the CARTOON! It's simple and free to play and a lot of FUN! This game will take you on a journey to meet the best cartoons in the history of entertainment! 

Imagine all the funny or comic characters, superheroes, villains, animated movies and serials, anime etc. that you have grown up watching. Well, you are getting all of them in ONE game! 

But can you recognize them? This game is truly an entertaining challenge!

EARN BRAGGING RIGHTS!
Can you recognize the best cartoons? Test your knowledge and become the ultimate Entertainment Guru. Even logos and shadows are used at certain places to denote cartoons. So use your mind sharply. 

PLAY SOME, LEARN SOME! 
Don’t miss out on knowing about the most popular cartoons in the world. This game is not just limited to film or tv. It is packed with awesome pics and endless entertainment. Also, it is not hard to play at all! 

SHARE THE FUN! 
This picture puzzle game is perfect to play with your family and friends. Get everyone involved! Bring them around your mobile phone to play this trivia game. You can play question answer with them using this app. Or you can simply challenge them to see who knows more. 

Credit for the amazing images, icon and logo goes to – Makhmoor Syed !

title: Family Trivia Free
description:
Finally! An interactive question game for the whole family made by educators.  Children and grown-ups of all ages can play an interactive, educational and fun trivia quiz on equal footing. 

All players have the same chances to get the final prize since the questions are adapted to their ages in Fun Family Trivia! 

Would you like to...

- Play trivia as a family with questions adapted to different age groups?
- Learn with fun questions and educational challenges?
- Learn more about animals, the human body, traveling the world, cooking and much more?
- Get prizes and fun rewards?
- Develop different areas of their education through play?
- Use technology educationally?

Meet the pirate, the monster and the magic fairy? They're our Smile & Learn characters. With this game you can meet them, dress them and customize them as you like as you progress through the game.

With these objectives, Smile & Learn offers you the interactive game FUN FAMILY TRIVIA with these features:

- Age: 3 and up. 
- Seven educational categories (cooking, animals, music, human body, letters, numbers and world traveler) and more than 1,000 questions. 
- Fun and educational questions for the whole family. Designed by educators. 
- Fun avatars to customize the game.
- Playing using beautiful natural landscapes that stand in for traditional boards.
- Final recognition for the winner and fun rewards. 
- It is easy and simple to watch the child's progress. 
- Available in different languages: Spanish, English, French. 
- Original music and illustrations. 
- 100% safe: No in-app advertising or purchases.

Summary:

The interactive game “Fun family TRIVIA”  is a GREAT question GAME for the whole family.  Every member of the family can enter their information and age. That means the questions they get asked are adapted to their age. All the players have the same changes of getting the final prize! 
The game includes educational questions designed by educators and grouped into different categories (cooking, animals, music, human body, letters, numbers and world traveler). Smiling and learning has never been so fun!

title: Trivial Music Quiz
description:
ARE YOU A MUSIC FAN?
This game is for you! Enjoy thousands of questions and images of the best songs, bands, artists, awards, albums and more! Test your knowledge and play nonstop!

QUESTIONS WITH IMAGES
Do you know the covers of the best albums? And what about your favorite artists? Play with hundreds of questions with image and show what you know!

HOW TO PLAY
- Answer 10 questions in each round
- You have 30 seconds for each question, the faster you answer, the more points you earn!
- You have 3 lives so you do not lose points

TOO EASY?
This game adapts to your knowledge and will become increasingly challenging with questions from top artists like Rihanna, Sia, Lady Gaga, Eminem, Ed Sheeran and popular bands like Coldplay, U2, One Direction, Radiohead and much, much more!

QUESTIONS ALWAYS UPDATED
The music world changes every day so we regularly update the questions to the game so you can always have the latest news on your device!

PLAY WHENEVER YOU WANT!
Play with your friends, family, while waiting in line or at the bus stop! The game is completely FREE and you don’t need an internet connection to make the most of this quiz!

RATE THE QUESTIONS
Don’t you like that question? Are you sure the answer was not correct? After each game you can review, report and rate each question, indicating whether you like it or do not to improve the game everyday!

Go ahead! Start playing and enjoy the best of the music world!

Do you know the covers of the best albums? And what about your favorite artists? Play with hundreds of questions with image and show what you know!

HOW TO PLAY
- Answer 10 questions in each round
- You have 30 seconds for each question, the faster you answer, the more points you earn!
- You have 3 lives so you do not lose points

TOO EASY?
This game adapts to your knowledge and will become increasingly challenging with questions from top artists like Rihanna, Sia, Lady Gaga, Eminem, Ed Sheeran and popular bands like Coldplay, U2, One Direction, Radiohead and much, much more!

QUESTIONS ALWAYS UPDATED
The music world changes every day so we regularly update the questions to the game so you can always have the latest news on your device!

PLAY WHENEVER YOU WANT!
Play with your friends, family, while waiting in line or at the bus stop! The game is completely FREE and you don’t need an internet connection to make the most of this quiz!

RATE THE QUESTIONS
Don’t you like that question? Are you sure the answer was not correct? After each game you can review, report and rate each question, indicating whether you like it or do not to improve the game everyday!

Go ahead! Start playing and enjoy the best of the music world!
summary: An engaging quiz with the best songs, bands, artists and much more!

title: Cars Logos Quiz HD
description:
If you love all things cars or enjoy playing quizzes, then this game is for you!
You can play Car Logos Quiz absolutely free of charge.
You’ll see a logo of a car and need to name its brand. 
There are over 200 !!! car brands logos in the game.
At each game level you‘ll see one logo and several car brands names for you to choose from. If your guess is right, you’ll see the next logo from the group. If not—you lose 1 of your 3 tries (stars).

All logos are divided into 15 groups (icons top to bottom). 
There are 4 types of game levels for each group (icons left to right).
1st type • Logo is shown in full, but there is no brand name labels. 
2nd type • Only a scaled up part of a logo is shown.
3rd type • A scaled up and rotated part of a logo is shown which complicates things for you. 
4th type • The most difficult and longest game level. Along with the brand logos from the current group, you’ll also see logos from all previous groups. 
A total of 60 game levels!
Your clear time for each level will be recorded, so you can later replay any level and beat your own fastest time. 
Car Logos Quiz is the perfect way to sharpen your visual memory and mental reflexes. 

We’ll be issuing new car logos games soon—be sure not to miss that! 
Thank you for choosing our game!

---------------------
Disclaimer
All car logos shown in this logo game are protected by copyright and/or registered trademarks.
This app, not anyone associated with it, claims any ownership (copyright or otherwise) of any logos used in this app. The use of low-resolution images in this application for the use of logos identifying qualifies as "fair use” under copyright law. We are not connected or affiliated with the brands/clubs. Any content will be removed if asked by the legal owners.
---------------------
Privacy Policy
The "0km Apps" development studio knows that you care about how your personal information is used and passed on to third parties. We take your privacy seriously. This privacy policy is current on March 23, 2018 and may be updated in the future. So please watch for the changes.

All software products of the "0km Apps" studio do not operate in any way with any personal data identifying a particular user.

We do not collect, do not use and do not share such personal data as contact list, media files, email, any user id., user age, gender, IMEI, etc.

Get more information about privacy policy on https://0km.mobi/policy.html

title: HQ Trivia Helper
description:
HQ Trivia Helper utilizes a complex artificial intelligence combined with the knowledge base of the internet to provide you with live answers for the game show HQ Trivia.

This is the Free Credit based version. An Unlimited version is also available on the Google Play Store.

HQ Trivia Helper began as a private project with the objective of assisting a small group of friends to win HQ Trivia. After extensive testing, heaps of fun and a pile of winnings we have decided to present this application to the public.

HQ Trivia Helper is not designed to give you every correct answer for the game show HQ Trivia.

But it can reliably answer those difficult, obscure and random questions which may stump you.

Pay attention to your instincts and knowledge.

Answer using your common sense and remain engaged in the game.

When and if you have no better source of information to make your choice, HQ Trivia Helper is there to help you win!

Good Luck and Have Fun!

title: TriviAlist Showbiz: Offline Trivia Quiz Game
description:
TriviAlist Showbiz is a sequel to 'TriviAlist', the hit trivia quiz game about the biggest, the best, the most famous and the most infamous. It’s a game all about the ‘A - list’ of life. Can you SORT, MATCH and SELECT all the lists we throw at you? 

Get tested on your knowledge of movies, actors, music & musicians, stage shows, TV, celebrities, and more. Do you know who did and did not appear in the Die Hard movies?  How about sorting your favorite musicals in the order they came out? Can you match the hit song to the singer?

It's a trivia quiz game like no other. 
TriviAlist Showbiz is free to play!
TriviAlist Showbiz does not require a connection to play! You can play offline / with no wifi connection—it's not a problem!
TriviAlist Showbiz is suitable for all ages to play, adults and kids alike!

It’s totally free to play, however some game features can also be purchased for real money. If you don't want this optional feature, please disable in-app purchases in your device's settings. 
If you have any problems or would like to make any suggestions, you can reach us at gamesupport@dctmedia.co.uk or find us on Facebook at https://www.facebook.com/TriviAlist-1906488056299144/
descriptionHTML:
TriviAlist Showbiz is a sequel to 'TriviAlist', the hit trivia quiz game about the biggest, the best, the most famous and the most infamous. It’s a game all about the ‘A - list’ of life. Can you SORT, MATCH and SELECT all the lists we throw at you?

Get tested on your knowledge of movies, actors, music & musicians, stage shows, TV, celebrities, and more. Do you know who did and did not appear in the Die Hard movies? How about sorting your favorite musicals in the order they came out? Can you match the hit song to the singer?

It's a trivia quiz game like no other.
TriviAlist Showbiz is free to play!
TriviAlist Showbiz does not require a connection to play! You can play offline / with no wifi connection—it's not a problem!
TriviAlist Showbiz is suitable for all ages to play, adults and kids alike!

It’s totally free to play, however some game features can also be purchased for real money. If you don't want this optional feature, please disable in-app purchases in your device's settings.
If you have any problems or would like to make any suggestions, you can reach us at gamesupport@dctmedia.co.uk or find us on Facebook at https://www.facebook.com/TriviAlist-1906488056299144/
summary: Test your knowledge of stage, screen, music & more. A free family trivia game

title: Adivina el personaje de Soy Luna
description:
Diviértete adivinando el nombre de todos los personajes principales de la famosa serie de televisión, soy luna.

En este juego te encontraras con dibujos de los personajes más famosos de la serie y tú deberás escribir sus nombres. Por cada nivel que completes recibirás monedas, que te servirán para comprar ayudas si es necesario.

Si no sabes el nombre de algún personaje de soy Luna, puedes compartir la imagen con tus amigos para que te ayuden.

El juego cuenta con más de 40 niveles con personajes como: Luna, Matteo, Ámbar, Simón, Nina, Gastón, entre otros muchos más. Los primeros niveles son más fáciles, pero a medida que avances el juego se irá complicando.

Descarga el juego y demuestra que eres un súper fan de soy Luna, superando todos los niveles.

title: Hi Guess the Movie: Film Quiz
description:
So you call yourself a movie buff?? Well, you might have already seen millions of them, but how many can you actually recall when seeing images of those movie characters?

Complete the level by guessing the full name of the movie from a group of scrambled letters. Which category are you good at? Wanna guess by genres? Options vary from action, animation, drama, TV show and so on. Or feeling like more fun to guess from movie stars & celebrities? Or you can even play by its time slot: 2013, 2014 or top movies in 2015? 

Choose one category to start with and unlock for more surprising challenges!!

What we offer:

Top rating movies from imdb/Flixster/Popcorn Time
All genres of blockbusters that you could possibly think of
Real & cool poster-like images from the hottest top movies 
Our artists’ one and only vivid drawing 

Don’t bother heading to the theatres/cinemas? Now you can still have an awesome movie experience with this APP!!

Features:

Addictive trivia quiz game
High Quality of Graphics
Facebook Connect 
Helpful hints
Ongoing Updates
No Complex Rules
Unlimited Fun and joy
Completely FREE to play

Get stuck by one particular question? No worries!! There are 4 helpers you can choose from:

Click on in-app button to reach out to your Facebook friends
Use “Reveal Letter” function to have one letter revealed
Use “Remove Letter” function to have one useless letter removed
Use “Reveal Answer” function to get the answer and go to the next puzzle

What are you waiting for then? Get this app immediately and find out what level of movie maniac are you! 

Don’t forget to bring your family/friends along with you and see who is the real master here! OR teaming up together & get all pictures solved like a PRO! 

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Thank you for the ongoing support and love for Hi Studio Games Production. Please do check out our other popular games, too.

title: The Price is Right
description:
Guess the right price of different products you can find on the Amazon website.

The development of the game is very simple: choose a category of products and guess the price of 10 different products.

There are 4 different game modes:
- Approaching the maximum price but not going over its right price
- Choose between 4 options the correct price
- Decide if the proposed price for a product is correct or not
- Choose between 2 products which is the most expensive

title: History Trivia Quiz
description:
Are you ready for a new history trivia challenge? Download our new History Trivia Quiz and test your world history knowledge for free! 

New history questions are finally on your way, so don’t miss out our new History Trivia Quiz! This is a new global history game for all history lovers. It’s a highly educational quiz game that can give you a lot regarding the world history. History Trivia Quiz is also a free app and it’s only a few clicks away, so what are you waiting for? Go get it and start playing NOW! 

World history knowledge: we created a quiz game about world history which means that you will get history questions about the history of various countries of the world, famous leaders and historical events from the entire globe, and then you get to read interesting history TRIVIA facts on each of them. Amazing, right? 

HISTORY TRIVIA QUIZ GAME FEATURES:

➞ LANGUAGE: this history quiz game is available in Croatian, English, French, German, Italian, Portuguese, Russian, Serbian and Spanish
➞  HINTS - if you get stuck on a certain trivia question, a hint can be of help OR you can
➞  SKIP QUESTION , free quiz questions can be skipped. Lose one life and move to the next history trivia question
➞  HEARTS are your lives, each incorrect answer is one heart less
➞  ASK A FRIEND for help if you run out of all hints
➞ FUN FACTS follow every history quiz question and give you a chance to read the most interesting information! 
➞  CERTIFICATE - you get it once you answer all world history trivia questions and answers!

* MODERN HISTORY QUIZ: Test yourself on American history and U.S. presidents! Learn about French History, Kings of France and French revolution! Read about the role of Germany in World Wars, inform yourself more on Italian History, British monarchy and dynasties, Chinese empire and history of Japan! All in one!

* ANCIENT HISTORY QUIZ: We didn’t forget the ancient worlds as well as the ancient civilizations that were the foundation of today’s history. Answer questions about Babylon and Mesopotamia, read trivia facts about the Aztec empire, the code of Hammurabi, and so many others. 

It’s trivia quiz: Answer world trivia HISTORY questions so you can read some amazing history TRIVIA facts!

History is a “must-know” if you want to be well-informed and educated. It is a part of general knowledge, so if you want to be an emancipated individual, you have to know something about it. That’s why we created this smartphone app, so you can learn and read anytime on your Android™ phone, and play it whenever you want. This history quiz is a new educational game that can really inform you and help you expand your world history knowledge. It is also one of the best entertainment apps that you’re going to adore completely.
It’s only a few clicks away, so, download History Trivia Quiz and challenge yourself for free, now!

LICENCE:

- Images and sounds used in the History Trivia Quiz questions and answers game are under the Public Domain or Creative Commons license. 
- For more info about the images and songs used in the app, please visit the Credits section within in this history knowledge quiz itself.
- Some of the facts used for making these trivia questions and answers, as well as for fun facts, are borrowed from official sites like https://www.factslides.com/ and https://learnodo-newtonic.com/interesting-facts. 

- Android is a trademark of Google Inc. This world history general knowledge quiz game is not endorsed by or affiliated with Google Inc.
- Google Play is a service provided by Google Inc. History Trivia Quiz app is not endorsed by or affiliated with Google Inc. 

* History Trivia Quiz is an intellectual property of FantasyQuizzes.

title: Fairy Tail Trivia
description:
Fairy Tail Trivia is a fun game to test how much you know about Fairy Tail anime.
Avid readers and fans will totally enjoy this game.
Some of the questions are designed to be simple for you to gain coins for the later hard questions on the way.

***Content***
Trivia questions will include the FT series and movies, Fairy Tail x Rave and OVA.
Questions will not be limited to main events but also includes character details like their crest, weapon and relationship to other characters.
There are over 200 plus fun, educational and interesting Fairy Tail trivia questions that awaits you.

Note:
*We assumed that you are updated on your Fairy Tail readings before playing this game or else some of the trivia/questions may spoil you haven't watched yet.
*After reaching level 48, you have to click the "check new levels" button to download additional levels.

****Game Play****
1. There will be 1 question on each level.
2. You can use button HINT when you're stuck which will cost coins that you've earned from previous levels.
3. To gain bonus coins, you can either share the game or watch videos if there's available at the moment.
*******************
Please rate us if you enjoy this game.
Comment below if you want us to make more anime trivia games for free.

Thank you and Enjoy!

title: Analizame!  (Tests Divertidos)
description:
Recopilación de tests de Analizame.com para que analices tu personalidad, tu inteligencia o simplemente te entretengas un rato! :)

Recuerda que los tests son simplemente de carácter recreativo y no deben ser tomados muy en serio.

* * * [ Available languages: spanish only / Disponible solamente en español] * * * 

La app tiene más de 50 tests variados, incluyendo tests de la personalidad/psicológicos, de agilidad mental, tests absurdos, tests de conocimientos, tests personalizados, tests con highscores y más

Los tests están divididos en 3 secciones o categorías:
* En la sección "Personalidad: están los tests psicológicos donde podrás analizar tu personalidad y conocerte mejor.
* En la sección de "Mentales": están los tests de inteligencia, lógica o agilidad mental que puedes jugar varias veces para obtener un mejor puntaje y competir en el ranking mundial o con tus amigos cercanos.
* En la sección "Variados": están los demás tests que no encajaban en ninguna categoría así que encontrarás de todo un poco, por ejemplo: tests graciosos, tests absurdos, tests divertidos y algunos hasta útiles.

Recuerda que puedes hacer los tests sol@ o hacerlos a tus familiares y amigos para conocerles mejor y pasar un rato divertido!
:)

También podrás crear tus propios tests, para poner a prueba a tu familia, pareja, amigos, conocidos...

La app también contiene adivinanzas, retos diarios, niveles de usuario, 
tablas de puntajes y más... todo esto gratis y en español!

TESTS DISPONIBLES: 
-------------------------------------------
- Test de los Caminos
- El BURRÓMETRO
- Test de Telepatía
- ¿Cómo te ven los demás?
- Test de Cálculo Mental
- Tu Caricatura y Personalidad
- Test de Ortografía
- Test de los Zombies
- Test de Prioridades

- Test del Cocodrilo
- Test de Capitales
- ¿Eres adicto a Internet?
- Test del Río
- El Feómetro
- Test de las Frutas
- ¿Qué animal eres en la cama?

descriptionHTML:
Recopilación de tests de Analizame.com para que analices tu personalidad, tu inteligencia o simplemente te entretengas un rato! :)

Recuerda que los tests son simplemente de carácter recreativo y no deben ser tomados muy en serio.

* * * [ Available languages: spanish only / Disponible solamente en español] * * *

La app tiene más de 50 tests variados, incluyendo tests de la personalidad/psicológicos, de agilidad mental, tests absurdos, tests de conocimientos, tests personalizados, tests con highscores y más

Los tests están divididos en 3 secciones o categorías:
* En la sección "Personalidad: están los tests psicológicos donde podrás analizar tu personalidad y conocerte mejor.
* En la sección de "Mentales": están los tests de inteligencia, lógica o agilidad mental que puedes jugar varias veces para obtener un mejor puntaje y competir en el ranking mundial o con tus amigos cercanos.
* En la sección "Variados": están los demás tests que no encajaban en ninguna categoría así que encontrarás de todo un poco, por ejemplo: tests graciosos, tests absurdos, tests divertidos y algunos hasta útiles.

Recuerda que puedes hacer los tests sol@ o hacerlos a tus familiares y amigos para conocerles mejor y pasar un rato divertido!
:)

También podrás crear tus propios tests, para poner a prueba a tu familia, pareja, amigos, conocidos...

La app también contiene adivinanzas, retos diarios, niveles de usuario,
tablas de puntajes y más... todo esto gratis y en español!
